vertical-align: text-top;

			<strong>ZOLINZA&#174; </strong><br />(vorinostat) <br />Capsules<br />U.S. Patent No. 7,456,219<br />U.S. Patent No. 7,652,069<br />U.S. Patent No. 7,851,509<br />U.S. Patent No. 8,093,295<br />
		</div>
	</div>
</div><p></p><p align="right">Revised Date: 1/31/17</p>
                            </div><!-- End Prescription Pharmaceuticals -->
                            <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane" id="tabs3">
                               ﻿<p align="center"> A | B | <a class='linkActive'  id='scrolltoC'  href="#C_Vaccine">C</a> | D | E | F | G | H | I | J | K | L | M | N | O | P | Q | <a class='linkActive'  id='scrolltoR'  href="#R_Vaccine">R</a> | S | T | U | V | X | Y | Z</p><br /><br /><div id="patent-content-holder">
	<div id="patent-row" class="row">
		<div id="patent" class="col-lg-3 col-md-3">
			<a id="C_Vaccine"></a><strong>Comvax&#174;</strong><br />[HAEMOPHILUS b CONJUGATE (MENINGOCOCCAL PROTEIN CONJUGATE) and HEPATITIS B (RECOMBINANT) VACCINE]<br />U.S. Patent No. 6,544,757<br />
		</div><div id="patent" class="col-lg-3 col-md-3">
			<a id="R_Vaccine"></a><strong>Recombivax&#174;</strong><br />HEPATITIS B VACCINE (RECOMBINANT)<br />U.S. Patent No. 6,544,757<br />
		</div>
	</div>
</div><p></p><p align="right">Revised Date: 1/31/17</p>

      <div class="modal-header">
        <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="modal"><span aria-hidden="true">&times;</span><span class="sr-only">Close</span></button>
        <h4 class="modal-title" id="myModalLabel">Forward-Looking Statement</h4>
      </div>
      <div class="modal-body">
       <h4>Forward-Looking Statement of Merck & Co., Inc., Kenilworth, NJ, USA </h4>
                <p>This website of Merck & Co., Inc., Kenilworth, NJ, USA (the “company”) includes “forward-looking statements” within the meaning of the safe harbor provisions of the United States Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995. These statements are based upon the current beliefs and expectations of the company’s management and are subject to significant risks and uncertainties. There can be no guarantees with respect to pipeline products that the products will receive the necessary regulatory approvals or that they will prove to be commercially successful. If underlying assumptions prove inaccurate or risks or uncertainties materialize, actual results may differ materially from those set forth in the forward-looking statements.
                </p>
                <p>Risks and uncertainties include, but are not limited to, general industry conditions and competition; general economic factors, including interest rate and currency exchange rate fluctuations; the impact of pharmaceutical industry regulation and healthcare legislation in the United States and internationally; global trends toward healthcare cost containment; technological advances, new products and patents attained by competitors; challenges inherent in new product development, including obtaining regulatory approval; the company’s ability to accurately predict future market conditions; manufacturing difficulties or delays; financial instability of international economies and sovereign risk; dependence on the effectiveness of the company’s patents and other protections for innovative products; and the exposure to litigation, including patent litigation, and/or regulatory actions. </p>
                <p>The company undertakes no obligation to publicly update any forward-looking statement, whether as a result of new information, future events or otherwise. Additional factors that could cause results to differ materially from those described in the forward-looking statements can be found in the company’s 2015 Annual Report on Form 10-K and the company’s other filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) available at the SEC’s Internet site (www.sec.gov). </p>
                <h4>No Duty to Update  </h4>
                <p>The information contained in this website was current as of the date presented. The company assumes no duty to update the information to reflect subsequent developments. Consequently, the company will not update the information contained in the website and investors should not rely upon the information as current or accurate after the presentation date. </p>
      </div>
      
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

    <li><a href="/about/views-and-positions/home.html" title="">Views and Positions</a>
        <ul>

    <script type="text/javascript">
		$(document).ready(function($){
			$(this).scrollTop(0);
            $("#menu").mmenu({
               "slidingSubmenus": false
            });
			var API = $("#menu").data("mmenu");
			
			//Shows the menu on load
			$('nav#menu ul').css('display','block');
			
			API.bind("closed", function(){
				$('input#mtag').blur();
			});
			$('.megamenu').megaMenuCompleteSet({
				menu_speed_show : 300, // Time (in milliseconds) to show a drop down
				menu_speed_hide : 200, // Time (in milliseconds) to hide a drop down
				menu_speed_delay : 200, // Time (in milliseconds) before showing a drop down
				menu_effect : 'hover_fade', // Drop down effect, choose between 'hover_fade', 'hover_slide', etc.
				menu_click_outside : 1, // Clicks outside the drop down close it (1 = true, 0 = false)
				menu_show_onload : 0, // Drop down to show on page load (type the number of the drop down, 0 for none)
				menu_responsive:1 // 1 = Responsive, 0 = Not responsive
			});



			var cnt = $("#breadcrumbs-1b .menu_sub").contents();
			$("#breadcrumbs-1b").replaceWith(cnt);


			//var url = location.pathname.substring(location.pathname.lastIndexOf("/") + 1);
			var url = location.pathname;
			console.log(url);

			var currentItem = $(".items").find("[href$='" + url + "']");
			console.log(currentItem);

			$(".breadcrumb").html($("<a href='/index.html'>Home</a>"));
			$(currentItem.parents("li").clone().get().reverse()).each(function () {
			    $(".breadcrumb").append(" <span class=\"slash\">/</span> ").append( $(this).children("a"));
			});

			var total_breadcrumbs = $('.breadcrumb').children("a").length;

			console.log(total_breadcrumbs);

			$(".breadcrumb a:last").addClass("active");

			// get test settings
            var byRow = $('body').hasClass('test-rows');

            // apply matchHeight to each item container's items
            $('.logo-nav-container').each(function() {
                $(this).children('div').matchHeight({
                    byRow: byRow
                });
            });

            $(".ourpeople").mouseover(function(){
                $(".aboutus-description p").hide();
                $(".aboutus-description p.ourpeople-description").show();
            }).mouseout(function(){
                $(".aboutus-description p").show();
                $(".aboutus-description p.ourpeople-description").hide();
            });

			$('#myModalvid').on('hidden.bs.modal', function (e) {
				$("#myModalvid iframe").attr("src", $("#myModalvid iframe").attr("src"));
			});

            var str=location.href.toLowerCase();
            $('.menu_sub li a').each(function() {
                if (str.indexOf(this.href.toLowerCase()) > -1) {
                    $("li.active-link").removeClass("active-link");
                    $(this).parent().addClass("active-link"); 
                }
            }); 
            $('li.active-link').parents().each(function(){
                if ($(this).is('li')){
                    $(this).addClass("active-link"); 
                }                             
            });
			
			$('li.active-link ul li.privacy ul').css('display','block');

            $('.menu_sub li ul li a').each(function() {
                if (str.indexOf(this.href.toLowerCase()) > -1) {
                    $(".menu_sub li ul li.sub-link").removeClass("sub-link");
                    $(this).children().addClass("sub-link"); 
                }
            }); 
            $('.menu_sub li ul li.sub-link').children().each(function(){
                if ($(this).is('li')){
                    $(this).addClass("sub-link"); 
                }                             
            });

            $('.menu_sub li.active-link > ul').css('display','block');

			
			$('#equalheight div.media').equalHeights();

            $(".menu-button.menu-drop.ql").click(function(){
                    //$(".secondary_navigation .menu-dropdown.menu-dropdown7").css({left:'auto',right:'0',opacity:'1'});
                    $(".secondary_navigation .menu-dropdown.menu-dropdown7").toggleClass("open-quicklinks");
            });
			
			/* SEARCH BOX */
			$('#search').data('holder',$('#search').attr('placeholder'));

			$('#search').focusin(function(){
				$(this).attr('placeholder','');
			});
			$('#search').focusout(function(){
				$(this).attr('placeholder',$(this).data('holder'));
			});
			
			// On mouse entering the search field, add class, "open-search-field".
			$('input#search[type="text"]').on('mouseenter', function(){ 
				$('input#search').addClass('open-search-field');
				console.log('mouseenter');
			}).on('mouseleave', function(){
				// On mouse leave, remove the "open-search-field" css class.
				$('input#search').removeClass('open-search-field');
				
				if(!$('input#search').val()){
					console.log('Has no value');
					$(this).blur();
				} else {
					// If the input field has value, add css class, "open-search-field".  Also, if the input field has value, open the suggestion box.
					$('input#search').addClass('open-search-field');
					$('#ui-id-1').css('display', 'block');
					console.log('Has value, input box and suggestion box are opened.');
					
					// On mouse leave, hide suggestion box, remove css class, "open-search-field" and remove value from the input field.
					$('#ui-id-1').on('mouseleave', function(){
						$('#ui-id-1').css('display','none');
						$('input#search[type="text"]').removeClass('open-search-field');
						$('input#search[type="text"]').val('');
					});
				}

				//alert('mouseout');
				console.log('mouseleave');
			});
			
			var browserWidth = $(window).width(); 
			if (navigator.userAgent.match(/(iPad)/)) {
			
				if (browserWidth == 768) {
					//alert('Width: 768px');
				} else if (browserWidth == 1024){
					//alert('Width: 1024px');
					
					$('.close-dropdown').click(function(){
				    	$('.dropdown_fullwidth').css('display','none');
				    });
					
					$('input#search[type="text"]').on('blur', function(){
						//alert('Keyboard is closed.');
						$('input#search[type="text"]').removeClass('open-search-field');
						$('input#search[type="text"]').val('');
					});

					$('.megamenu .megamenu_drop').attr("href", "#");
					
					$('.megamenu li a.menu-t1').css('display','none');
					
					
					//Reopens the search field.
					var search = document.getElementById("search");
					search.ontouchstart = function(e)
					{
						this.setAttribute('class', 'open-search-field');
					}
					
					/*$('a').on('click touchend', function(){
						$('input#search[type="text"]').removeClass('open-search-field');
					});*/
					
					
				}// End of browserWidth
				
				//Detect ipad orientation change
				//$(window).bind('orientationchange', function(event){
				$(window).on('orientationchange', function(event){
					//alert('new orientation: ' + event.orientation);
					var ipad_portrait = window.matchMedia("(orientation: portrait)");
					if(ipad_portrait.matches){
						//alert('Portrait');
					} else {
						//alert('Landscape');
						/*$('.megamenu').megaMenuCompleteSet({
					        menu_effect : 'click_fade'
					    });
					    */
					    $('.close-dropdown').click(function(){
					    	$('.dropdown_fullwidth').css('display','none');
					    });

					    $('.megamenu .megamenu_drop').attr("href", "#");

					    $('.megamenu li a.menu-t1').css('display','none');
					     
					}
					
				});
			}
			
			/*
			if( /iPad/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) {
				$('input#search[type="text"]').on('blur', function(){
					//alert('Keyboard is closed.');
					//$('input#search[type="text"]').removeClass('open-search-field');
				});
			}
			*/
			
			//$( "#search" ).mouseout(function() {
				//$('#search').focusout(function(){
					//$(this).attr('placeholder',$(this).data('holder'));
				//});
				//$(this).val('');
				//$(this).val('').attr('placeholder',$(this).data('holder'));
			//});
			/* END OF SEARCH BOX */
		});
	</script>
    <script src="/js/jquery-ui-1.10.3.custom.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
    <!-- code for search, date :12-aug-2013 done by :HCLT -->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        jQuery.support.cors = true;
        // Location of the query suggestion service
        var varQueryUrl;
        // Query suggestion scope
        var varQueryScope;
        varQueryUrl = "http://" + window.location.hostname + "/QCHandler";
        //varQueryUrl = "http://usctapc00068:16301/LuceneService.svc/GetQuerySuggestions";        
        varQueryScope = "merckdotcom";
        function blank(a) { if(a.value == a.defaultValue) a.value = "";}
        function unblank(a) { if(a.value == "") a.value = a.defaultValue; }
        
        
        function Suggestions(frmid, txtid, searchTerm) {
            var txt = document.getElementById(txtid);
            var GetData = varQueryUrl;
            searchTerm = $.trim(searchTerm);
            // remove all special characters from the string 
            searchTerm = searchTerm.replace(/[`~!@#$%^&*()_|+\-=?;:'",.<>\{\}\[\]\\\/]/gi, '');
            if ((searchTerm != "") && (searchTerm.length > 3)) {
                $.ajax({
                    type: "POST",
                    url: GetData,
                    data: '{"searchRequest": { "SearchTerm":"' + searchTerm + '","ScopeName":"' + varQueryScope + '" }}',
                    contentType: "application/json; charset=utf-8",
                    dataType: "json",
                    processdata: true,
                    timeout: 30000,
                    cache: false,
                    success: function (result) {
                        var availableTags = result.GetQuerySuggestionsResult.QuerySuggestions;
                        $('#' + txtid).autocomplete({
                            source: availableTags,
                            select: function (event, ui) {
                                this.value = ui.item.label;
                                $('#' + frmid).submit();
                            }
							
							//open: function(event, ui){
							//	if ($(this).is(':not(:focus)')){
							//		$(this).autocomplete('close');
							//	}
							//},
							//close: function(event, ui){
							//	return false;
							//}
							
							
                        });
						//.blur(function(event){
						//	if((/iPhone/iPod/iPad/).test(navigator.userAgent)) {return;}
						//	if(this).cancelBlur){
						//		delete this.cancelBlur;
						//		return;
						//	}
							
						//	clearTimeout(this.searching);
						//	this.close(event);
						//	this._change(event);
						//);
                    },
                    error: function (xhr, ajaxOptions, thrownError) {
                        //alert(xhr.statusText);
                    }
                });
            }
            else
            {
                $("#" + txtid).autocomplete({
                    source: ''
                });
            }         
        }
    </script>
    <!-- search code ends-->
	
	
    <script language="JavaScript">
		var externalLinkWarning;
		var registeredsymbolstyle;
		var registeredsymbolHerostyle;
		var is_chrome = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().indexOf('chrome') > -1;
		
		if (/Firefox[\/\s](\d+\.\d+)/.test(navigator.userAgent)){
		
		externalLinkWarning = "The link you have selected will take you to a site outside Merck.com. \n\nMerck does not review or control the content of any non-Merck site. Merck does not endorse and is not responsible for the accuracy, content, practices, or standards of any non-Merck sources.";
		
		registeredsymbolstyle = "<sup style='padding:0px;font-size: 0.63em; top:0.23em;line-height: 0.5em;vertical-align:super'>&reg;</sup>";
		registeredsymbolHerostyle="<sup style='padding:0.3em 0em 0em 0em; line-height: 0.5em;top: -0.02em;font-size: 18px;'>&reg;</sup>";
		
		}
		else if (is_chrome == true)
		{
		externalLinkWarning = "The link you have selected will take you to a site outside Merck.com. \n\nMerck does not review or control the content of any non-Merck site. Merck does not endorse and is not responsible for the accuracy, content, practices, or standards of any non-Merck sources.";
		
		registeredsymbolstyle = "<sup style='padding:0px;font-size: 0.63em; top:-0.01em; line-height: 0.5em;vertical-align:super'>&reg;</sup>";
		registeredsymbolHerostyle="<sup style='padding:-0.01em;top: -0.01em;font-size: 18px;'>&reg;</sup>";
		}
		else
		{
		externalLinkWarning = "The link you have selected will take you to a site outside Merck.com. \n\nMerck does not review or control the content of any non-Merck site. Merck does not endorse and is not responsible for the accuracy, content, practices, or standards of any non-Merck sources.";
		
		registeredsymbolstyle = "<sup style='padding:0px;font-size: 0.88em; top:-0.01em;line-height: 0.9em;vertical-align:super;'>&reg;</sup>";
		registeredsymbolHerostyle="<sup style='padding:0.3em 0em 0em 0em;top: -0.02em;font-size: 21px;'>&reg;</sup>";
		}
		
		function extLink(link) {
		var elw = externalLinkWarning.replace(/\*n/g,'\n');
		var uc = confirm(elw);
		if (uc)
		{
		window.open(link);
		}
		
		}
    </script>
	
    <script language="JavaScript">
		var externalLinkWarningSG;
		var registeredsymbolstyle;
		var registeredsymbolHerostyle;
		var is_chrome = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().indexOf('chrome') > -1;
		
		if (/Firefox[\/\s](\d+\.\d+)/.test(navigator.userAgent)){
		
		externalLinkWarningSG = "You are now leaving www.merck.com, a website maintained by Merck & Co., Inc.  By continuing, you will be directed to our supplier diversity site. \n\nMerck & Co., Inc., Kenilworth, New Jersey, USA is known as MSD outside the United States and Canada.";
		
		registeredsymbolstyle = "<sup style='padding:0px;font-size: 0.63em; top:0.23em;line-height: 0.5em;vertical-align:super'>&reg;</sup>";
		registeredsymbolHerostyle="<sup style='padding:0.3em 0em 0em 0em; line-height: 0.5em;top: -0.02em;font-size: 18px;'>&reg;</sup>";
		
		}
		else if (is_chrome == true)
		{
		externalLinkWarningSG = "You are now leaving www.merck.com, a website maintained by Merck & Co., Inc.  By continuing, you will be directed to our supplier diversity site. \n\nMerck & Co., Inc., Kenilworth, New Jersey, USA is known as MSD outside the United States and Canada.";
		
		registeredsymbolstyle = "<sup style='padding:0px;font-size: 0.63em; top:-0.01em; line-height: 0.5em;vertical-align:super'>&reg;</sup>";
		registeredsymbolHerostyle="<sup style='padding:-0.01em;top: -0.01em;font-size: 18px;'>&reg;</sup>";
		}
		else
		{
		externalLinkWarningSG = "You are now leaving www.merck.com, a website maintained by Merck & Co., Inc.  By continuing, you will be directed to our supplier diversity site. \n\nMerck & Co., Inc., Kenilworth, New Jersey, USA is known as MSD outside the United States and Canada.";
		
		registeredsymbolstyle = "<sup style='padding:0px;font-size: 0.88em; top:-0.01em;line-height: 0.9em;vertical-align:super;'>&reg;</sup>";
		registeredsymbolHerostyle="<sup style='padding:0.3em 0em 0em 0em;top: -0.02em;font-size: 21px;'>&reg;</sup>";
		}
		
		function extLinkSG(link) {
		var elw = externalLinkWarningSG.replace(/\*n/g,'\n');
		var uc = confirm(elw);
		if (uc)
		{
		window.open(link);
		}
		
		}
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var checkeventcount = 1,prevTarget;
    $('.modal').on('show.bs.modal', function (e) {
        if(typeof prevTarget == 'undefined' || (checkeventcount==1 && e.target!=prevTarget))
        {  
          prevTarget = e.target;
          checkeventcount++;
          e.preventDefault();
          $(e.target).appendTo('body').modal('show');
        }
        else if(e.target==prevTarget && checkeventcount==2)
        {
          checkeventcount--;
        }
     });
</script>
    
    <!-- Add Custom Page Scripts Below -->
		<script>
          $(function () {
            $('#myTab a:last').tab('show')
          })
        </script>
﻿		<script>
	/**  
		scroll to element function
	**/
		function scrollToElement(selector, time, verticalOffset) {
			time = typeof(time) != 'undefined' ? time : 500;
			verticalOffset = typeof(verticalOffset) != 'undefined' ? verticalOffset : 0;
			element = $(selector);
			offset = element.offset();
			offsetTop = offset.top + verticalOffset;
			$('html, body').animate({
				scrollTop: offsetTop
			}, time);			
		}
		
	/**  
		document ready
	**/		
		$(document).ready(function() {
		
			/* scroll to */
				
				$('#scrolltoa').click(function (e) {
					e.preventDefault();
					scrollToElement('#A_Animal_Health', 250, -140);
				});
				$('#scrolltob').click(function (e) {
					e.preventDefault();
					scrollToElement('#B_Animal_Health', 250, -140);
				});
				$('#scrolltoc').click(function (e) {
					e.preventDefault();
					scrollToElement('#C_Animal_Health', 250, -140);
				});
				$('#scrolltod').click(function (e) {
					e.preventDefault();
					scrollToElement('#D_Animal_Health', 250, -140);
				});
				$('#scrolltoe').click(function (e) {
					e.preventDefault();
					scrollToElement('#E_Animal_Health', 250, -140);
				});
				$('#scrolltof').click(function (e) {
					e.preventDefault();
					scrollToElement('#F_Animal_Health', 250, -140);
				});
				$('#scrolltog').click(function (e) {
					e.preventDefault();
					scrollToElement('#G_Animal_Health', 250, -140);
				});
				$('#scrolltoh').click(function (e) {
					e.preventDefault();
					scrollToElement('#H_Animal_Health', 250, -140);
				});
				$('#scrolltoi').click(function (e) {
					e.preventDefault();
					scrollToElement('#I_Animal_Health', 250, -140);
				});
				$('#scrolltoj').click(function (e) {
					e.preventDefault();
					scrollToElement('#J_Animal_Health', 250, -140);
				});

		<script>
            /**  
                scroll to element function
            **/
                function scrollToElement(selector, time, verticalOffset) {
                    time = typeof(time) != 'undefined' ? time : 500;
                    verticalOffset = typeof(verticalOffset) != 'undefined' ? verticalOffset : 0;
                    element = $(selector);
                    offset = element.offset();
                    offsetTop = offset.top + verticalOffset;
                    $('html, body').animate({
                        scrollTop: offsetTop
                    }, time);			
                }
                
            /**  
                document ready
            **/		
                $(document).ready(function() {
                
                    /* scroll to */
                        
                        $('#p_scrolltoa').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#A_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltob').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#B_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltoc').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#C_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltod').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#D_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltoe').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#E_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltof').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#F_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltog').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#G_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltoh').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#H_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltoi').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#I_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltoj').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#J_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltok').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#K_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltol').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#L_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltom').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#M_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrollton').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#N_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltoo').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#O_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltop').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#P_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltoq').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#Q_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltor').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#R_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltos').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#S_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        $('#p_scrolltot').click(function (e) {

                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#Z_Prescription', 250, -140);
                        });
                        
                    
                    /* back to top */
                    
                        $('a.back-to-top').click(function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();
                            scrollToElement('#columnCenter');
                        });

﻿		<script>
	/**  
		scroll to element function
	**/
		function scrollToElement(selector, time, verticalOffset) {
			time = typeof(time) != 'undefined' ? time : 500;
			verticalOffset = typeof(verticalOffset) != 'undefined' ? verticalOffset : 0;
			element = $(selector);
			offset = element.offset();
			offsetTop = offset.top + verticalOffset;
			$('html, body').animate({
				scrollTop: offsetTop
			}, time);			
		}
		
	/**  
		document ready
	**/		
		$(document).ready(function() {
		
			/* scroll to */
				
				$('#v_scrolltoa').click(function (e) {
					e.preventDefault();

				});

  <!-- about page banner -->
       <div id="main" >
  <h2 class="element-invisible">You are here</h2><div class="breadcrumb"><span class="inline odd first"><a href="/">Home</a></span> <span class="delimiter">&rsaquo;</span> <span class="inline even"><a href="/legal">Legal</a></span> <span class="delimiter">&rsaquo;</span> <span class="inline odd last">Patents</span></div>    
           <div id="content" class="column" role="main">
      

      <a id="main-content"></a>
                    <h1 class="title" id="page-title">Patents</h1>
                                         
     

      


<article class="node-300 node node-policies view-mode-full clearfix" about="/legal/patents" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      <header>
                  <span property="dc:title" content="Patents" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>
      
          </header>
  
  <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"><div class="section"><p style="line-height: 20.8px;">TiVo Inc. is a leading provider of advanced television products, and TiVo's technology can be found in TiVo's retail products and in certain products offered by TiVo's commercial partners.</p><p style="line-height: 20.8px;">This page is intended to serve as notice under 35 U.S.C. § 287(a).</p><h2><em>Retail Products</em></h2><p style="line-height: 20.8px;"><em style="line-height: 20.8px;"><strong>TiVo BOLT and BOLT+ </strong></em><em>U.S. Pat. Nos. D435,561, D445,801, 6,233,389, 6,327,418, 6,385,739, 6,490,722, 6,642,939, 6,643,798, 6,728,713, 6,757,837, 6,757,906, 6,792,195, 6,847,778, 6,850,691, 7,228,556, 7,321,716, 7,409,546, 7,493,015, 7,529,465, 7,543,325, 7,558,472, 7,661,121, 7,665,111, 7,779,437, 7,779,446, 7,840,986, 7,861,258, 7,877,768, 7,882,520, 7,889,964, 7,895,633, 7,933,950  7,934,170, 7,986,868, 8,036,514, 8,079,046, 8,107,795, 8,111,975,  8,135,264, 8,146,130, 8,171,285, 8,181,203, 8,220,021, 8,261,300, 8,301,648, 8,316,396, 8,321,901, 8,347,337, 8,443,389, 8,453,180, 8,453,193, 8,457,476, 8,464,309, 8,478,114, 8,526,781, 8,577,205, 8,660,410, 8,676,035, 8,812,850, 8,832,744, 8,943,527, 8,948,569, 8,959,099, 8,965,173, 8,965,182, 8,989,564, 9,036,981, 9,060,099, 9,083,941, 9,088,826, 9,106,881, 9,113,219</em><em style="line-height: 20.8px;">. Other patents pending.</em></p><p style="line-height: 20.8px;"><em><strong>TiVo Roamio</strong> U.S. Pat. Nos. D435,561, D445,801, 6,327,418, 6,385,739, 6,490,722, 6,642,939, 6,728,713, 6,757,837, 6,757,906, 6,792,195, 6,847,778, 6,850,691, 7,228,556, 7,321,716, 7,409,546, 6,233,389, 7,493,015, 7,529,465, 7,543,325, 7,558,472, 7,661,121, 7,665,111, 7,779,437, 7,779,446, 7,840,986, 7,861,258, 7,877,768, 7,882,520, 7,889,964, 7,895,633, 7,934,170, 7,986,868, 8,036,514, 8,079,046, 8,111,975, 8,135,264, 8,146,130, 8,171,285, 8,181,203, 8,220,021, 8,261,300, 8,301,648, 8,316,396, 8,321,901, 8.347,337, 8,443,389, 8,453,180, 8,453,193, 8,457,476, 8,464,309,8,577,205. Other patents pending.</em></p><p style="line-height: 20.8px;"><em><strong>TiVo Roamio Plus</strong> U.S. Pat. Nos. D435,561, D445,801, 6,327,418, 6,385,739, 6,490,722, 6,642,939, 6,728,713, 6,757,837, 6,757,906, 6,792,195, 6,847,778, 6,850,691, 7,228,556, 7,321,716, 7,409,546, 6,233,389, 7,493,015, 7,529,465, 7,543,325, 7,558,472, 7,661,121, 7,665,111, 7,779,437, 7,779,446, 7,840,986, 7,861,258, 7,877,768, 7,882,520, 7,889,964, 7,895,633, 7,934,170, 7,986,868, 8,036,514, 8,079,046, 8,111,975, 8,135,264, 8,146,130, 8,171,285, 8,181,203, 8,220,021, 8,261,300, 8,301,648, 8,316,396, 8,321,901, 8.347,337, 8,443,389, 8,453,180, 8,453,193, 8,457,476, 8,464,309, 8,577,205. Other patents pending.</em></p><p style="line-height: 20.8px;"><em><strong>TiVo Roamio Pro</strong> U.S. Pat. Nos. D435,561, D445,801, 6,327,418, 6,385,739, 6,490,722, 6,642,939, 6,728,713, 6,757,837, 6,757,906, 6,792,195, 6,847,778, 6,850,691, 7,228,556, 7,321,716, 7,409,546, 6,233,389, 7,493,015, 7,529,465, 7,543,325, 7,558,472, 7,661,121, 7,665,111, 7,779,437, 7,779,446, 7,840,986, 7,861,258, 7,877,768, 7,882,520, 7,889,964, 7,895,633, 7,934,170, 7,986,868, 8,036,514, 8,079,046, 8,111,975, 8,135,264, 8,146,130, 8,171,285, 8,181,203, 8,220,021, 8,261,300, 8,301,648, 8,316,396, 8,321,901, 8.347,337, 8,443,389, 8,453,180, 8,453,193, 8,457,476, 8,464,309, 8,577,205. Other patents pending.</em></p><p style="line-height: 20.8px;"><em><strong>TiVo Mini</strong> (TCDAD2000): D435,561; D445,801; 6,327,418; 6,385,739; 6,490,722; 6,642,939; 6,728,713; 6,757,837; 6,757,906; 6,792,195; 6,847,778; 6,850,691; 7,321,716; 7,409,546; 6,233,389; 7,493,015; 7,558,472; 7,661,121; 7,228,556; 7,779,437; 7,877,768; 7,882,520; 7,889,964. D435,561, D445,801, 6,327,418, 6,385,739, 6,490,722, 6,642,939, 6,728,713, 6,757,837, 6,757,906, 6,792,195, 6,847,778, 6,850,691, 7,228,556, 7,321,716, 7,409,546, 6,233,389, 7,493,015, 7,529,465, 7,543,325, 7,558,472, 7,661,121, 7,665,111, 7,779,437, 7,779,446, 7,840,986, 7,861,258, 7,877,768, 7,882,520, 7,889,964, 7,895,633, 7,934,170, 7,986,868, 8,036,514, 8,079,046, 8,111,975, 8,135,264, 8,146,130, 8,171,285, 8,181,203, 8,220,021, 8,261,300, 8,301,648, 8,316,396, 8,321,901, 8.347,337, 8,443,389, 8,453,180, 8,453,193, 8,457,476, 8,464,309, 8,577,205. Other patents pending.</em></p><p style="line-height: 20.8px;"><em><strong>TiVo Premiere XL4/Elite</strong> (TCD758250): U.S. Pat. Nos. Other patents pending.</em></p> <h2><em>Operator Products</em></h2><p style="line-height: 20.8px;"><em><strong>TiVo Premiere (available from Charter, Grande, RCN, and Suddenlink)</strong> (TCD746500): U.S. Pat. Other patents pending.</em></p><p style="line-height: 20.8px;"><em><strong>TiVo Premiere Q (available from Charter, Grande, RCN, and Suddenlink)</strong> (TCD750500): U.S. Pat. Nos.           <div class="compact-shelf shelf-item yt-uix-shelfslider yt-uix-shelfslider-at-head yt-uix-shelfslider-at-tail vve-check clearfix c4-visible-on-hover-container  yt-section-hover-container yt-uix-tdl"  data-sessionlink="ei=UlzlWMyJDoHqW7TOueAN&amp;ved=CFAQ3BwYACITCMz61p-cjtMCFQH1FgodNGcO3CibHA">
            <h2 class="branded-page-module-title">
      <a href="/playlist?list=PL9BtHzl4w-dmxrylJMQNX76ruvARIuW7s" class="yt-uix-sessionlink branded-page-module-title-link spf-nolink" data-sessionlink="ei=UlzlWMyJDoHqW7TOueAN&amp;ved=CGkQzh4iEwjM-tafnI7TAhUB9RYKHTRnDtwomxw">
            <span class="branded-page-module-title-text">
      <span class="" >USPTO for kids &amp; teachers</span>
    </span>

      </a>
        <a href="/watch?v=cdrk09NQClU&amp;list=PL9BtHzl4w-dmxrylJMQNX76ruvARIuW7s" class="yt-uix-button  shelves-play play-all-icon-btn yt-uix-sessionlink yt-uix-button-default yt-uix-button-size-small yt-uix-button-has-icon no-icon-markup" data-sessionlink="ei=UlzlWMyJDoHqW7TOueAN"><span class="yt-uix-button-content">Play all</span></a>

  </h2>


        <div class="shelf-description yt-ui-ellipsis yt-ui-ellipsis-2">
        Science of Innovation series in collaboration with NBC Learn and National Science Foundation. <br /><br />What is Innovation? Whether it happens among students in a classroom, or scientists and engineers in a laboratory, innovation is a process, a series of steps that begins with imagination, and results in the creation of something of value for society.
    </div>

            <h2 class="branded-page-module-title">
      <a href="/playlist?list=PL9BtHzl4w-dnDghUfC3oASgqdReR_mSNg" class="yt-uix-sessionlink branded-page-module-title-link spf-nolink" data-sessionlink="ei=UlzlWMyJDoHqW7TOueAN&amp;ved=CIcBEM4eIhMIzPrWn5yO0wIVAfUWCh00Zw7cKJsc">
            <span class="branded-page-module-title-text">
      <span class="" >Basic Facts About Trademarks</span>
    </span>

      </a>
        <a href="/watch?v=qHDRV2NTSEk&amp;list=PL9BtHzl4w-dnDghUfC3oASgqdReR_mSNg" class="yt-uix-button  shelves-play play-all-icon-btn yt-uix-sessionlink yt-uix-button-default yt-uix-button-size-small yt-uix-button-has-icon no-icon-markup" data-sessionlink="ei=UlzlWMyJDoHqW7TOueAN"><span class="yt-uix-button-content">Play all</span></a>

  </h2>


        <div class="shelf-description yt-ui-ellipsis yt-ui-ellipsis-2">
        This animated video series, created by the United States Patent and Trademark Office, provides all of the basic information you need to know about trademarks.
    </div>

      <span class="" >Special Emphasis Programs at USPTO</span>

    <article id="node-3077" class="node node-news article odd node-teaser-link view-mode-teaser_link rendered-by-ds clearfix" role="article"><div class="one-column at-panel panel-display clearfix" >
  <div class="region region-one-main">
    <div class="region-inner clearfix">
      <div class="field field-name-field-release-datetime field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser_link"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><span class="date_month">Apr</span><span class="date_day">04</span><span class="date_year">2017</span></p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-content-icons field-type-ds field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser_link"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="view view-content-icons view-id-content_icons view-display-id-panel_pane_1 view-dom-id-67c05cf48d316f8bc30fe21e2386b111">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="content-icon-group clearfix">
      </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div></div></div></div><div class=" group-teaser-content field-group-div"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser_link"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><h2><a href="/news/secretary-speeches/2017/04/us-secretary-commerce-wilbur-ross-delivers-keynote-federal-data-ntis">U.S. Secretary of Commerce Wilbur Ross Delivers Keynote on Federal Data at NTIS-Hosted Forum</a></h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-teaser field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser_link"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">On Tuesday, April 4, 2017, U.S. Secretary of Commerce Wilbur Ross delivered opening remarks at a Federal Data Meeting hosted by the Department of Commerce’s National Technical Information Service (NTIS) to explore how the federal government can be more effective in its data management and delivery of public services. The event also featured presentations by federal agencies including the Food and...</div></div></div><div class="more-link-btn"><a href="//www.commerce.gov/news/secretary-speeches/2017/04/us-secretary-commerce-wilbur-ross-delivers-keynote-federal-data-ntis"><span class="title">Read more</span><span class="fonticon icon-arrow-right" aria-hidden="true"></span></a></div>
</div>    </div>
  </div>
</div>
</article>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even views-row-last">
    <article id="node-3076" class="node node-news article even node-teaser-link view-mode-teaser_link rendered-by-ds clearfix" role="article"><div class="one-column at-panel panel-display clearfix" >
  <div class="region region-one-main">
    <div class="region-inner clearfix">
      <div class="field field-name-field-release-datetime field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser_link"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><span class="date_month">Apr</span><span class="date_day">04</span><span class="date_year">2017</span></p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-content-icons field-type-ds field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser_link"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="view view-content-icons view-id-content_icons view-display-id-panel_pane_1 view-dom-id-6ea2395e724044b78070229fc73fa9cd">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="content-icon-group clearfix">
      </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div></div></div></div><div class=" group-teaser-content field-group-div"><div class="field field-name-title field-type-ds field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser_link"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><h2><a href="/news/press-releases/2017/04/statement-us-secretary-commerce-wilbur-l-ross-jr-international-trade">Statement From U.S. Secretary Of Commerce Wilbur L. Ross, Jr. on International Trade in Goods and Services in February 2017</a></h2></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-teaser field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser_link"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">U.S. Secretary of Commerce Wilbur L. Ross, Jr. issued the following statement today on the release of the February 2017 U.S. International Trade in Goods and Services monthly data.  In February 2017, the trade deficit stood at $43.6 billion compared to $45.6 billion in February 2016.  In February 2017, exports of goods and services stood at $192.9 billion, compared to $180.7 billion in February...</div></div></div><div class="more-link-btn"><a href="//www.commerce.gov/news/press-releases/2017/04/statement-us-secretary-commerce-wilbur-l-ross-jr-international-trade"><span class="title">Read more</span><span class="fonticon icon-arrow-right" aria-hidden="true"></span></a></div>
</div>    </div>

      <article id="node-3074" class="node node-blog article even node-teaser-three-column view-mode-teaser_three_column rendered-by-ds clearfix" role="article"><div class="one-column at-panel panel-display clearfix" >
  <div class="region region-one-main">
    <div class="region-inner clearfix">
      <div class=" group-teaser-3col-card field-group-div"><div class="field field-name-field-release-datetime field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser_three_column"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><span class="date_month">Mar</span><span class="date_day">31</span><span class="date_year">2017</span></p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-image field-type-image field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser_three_column"><div class="field-items"><figure class="clearfix field-item even"><div id="file-2126" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">

        <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="/media/photo/hiddenfiguresjpg">hiddenfigures.jpg</a></h2>
    
  
  <div class="content">
    <img class="image-style-scale-300x300" src="https://www.commerce.gov/sites/commerce.gov/files/styles/scale_300x300/public/media/images/2017/hiddenfigures.jpg?itok=BN0h9VVH" width="300" height="201" alt="On Wednesday, March 29, 2017, the Department of Commerce hosted a panel discussion designed to highlight the achievements and contributions of women who work within the Department in honor of Women’s History Month." title="On Wednesday, March 29, 2017, the Department of Commerce hosted a panel discussion designed to highlight the achievements and contributions of women who work within the Department in honor of Women’s History Month." />  </div>

  
</div>
</figure></div></div><div class="field field-name-content-icons field-type-ds field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser_three_column"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><div class="view view-content-icons view-id-content_icons view-display-id-panel_pane_1 view-dom-id-16a58876cd2e9c3a3c537e47e075edcf">

        <div class="content-icon-group clearfix">

  </div>
</div>
</article><div class="panel-separator"></div><article id="node-3073" class="node node-blog article odd node-teaser-three-column view-mode-teaser_three_column rendered-by-ds clearfix" role="article"><div class="one-column at-panel panel-display clearfix" >
  <div class="region region-one-main">
    <div class="region-inner clearfix">
      <div class=" group-teaser-3col-card field-group-div"><div class="field field-name-field-release-datetime field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser_three_column"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><span class="date_month">Mar</span><span class="date_day">31</span><span class="date_year">2017</span></p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-image field-type-image field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser_three_column"><div class="field-items"><figure class="clearfix field-item even"><div id="file-2125" class="file file-image file-image-jpeg">

        <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="/media/photo/vondajpg">vonda.jpg</a></h2>
    
  
  <div class="content">

  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
    
            
    
    <div class="block-content">
      <p class="badges"><a href="http://open.commerce.gov/open-government-plan" target="_blank"><img alt="Commerce.gov/Open See the plan" src="//www.commerce.gov/sites/commerce.gov/files/styles/large/public/badge-open_228x190.jpg" title="Visit the Commerce.gov/open site" width="228" height="190" /></a> <a href="http://business.usa.gov" target="_blank"> <img alt="BusinessUSA" src="//www.commerce.gov/sites/commerce.gov/files/styles/large/public/business_usa_228x190.jpg" title="BusinessUSA Logo" width="228" height="190" /></a> <a href="http://acetool.commerce.gov" target="_blank"> <img alt="Assess Costs Everywhere Splash" src="//www.commerce.gov/sites/commerce.gov/files/styles/scale_250w/public/acetool_splash-badge.png" title="Assess Costs Everywhere" width="250" height="141" /></a> <a href="//www.commerce.gov/naturalcapital"><img alt="Natural Capital" class="image-style-scale-700w media-image img__fid__1398 img__view_mode__full attr__format__full attr__field_file_image_alt_text[und][0][value]__Natural Capital attr__field_file_image_title_text[und][0][value]__ attr__field_caption[und][0][value]__" src="//www.commerce.gov/sites/commerce.gov/files/styles/scale_700w/public/natural-capital-badge.jpg?itok=3HUETETW" /></a></p>
    </div>

    
    
  </div>
</div>
<div class="panel-separator"></div><div class="panel-pane pane-custom pane-2 no-title block">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">

                    <div class="region region-tertiary-content"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-social-share-social-share" class="block block-social-share odd first block-count-10 block-region-tertiary-content block-social-share" ><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Social Share</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><a href="http://facebook.com/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.commerce.gov%2Fhome&amp;t=Department%20of%20Commerce" class="social-share-facebook" title="Share to Facebook" target="_blank">Facebook</a>&nbsp;<a href="https://plus.google.com/share?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.commerce.gov%2Fhome" class="social-share-googleplus" title="Share to Google Plus" target="_blank">Google Plus</a>&nbsp;<a href="http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.commerce.gov%2Fhome&amp;text=Department%20of%20Commerce" class="social-share-twitter" title="Share to Twitter" target="_blank">Twitter</a>&nbsp;</div>
  </div></section><section id="block-views-doc-orgs-groups-block-1" class="block block-views even block-count-11 block-region-tertiary-content block-doc-orgs-groups-block-1" ><div class="block-inner clearfix">

function MM_preloadImages() { //v3.0
  var d=document; if(d.images){ if(!d.MM_p) d.MM_p=new Array();
    var i,j=d.MM_p.length,a=MM_preloadImages.arguments; for(i=0; i<a.length; i++)
    if (a[i].indexOf("#")!=0){ d.MM_p[j]=new Image; d.MM_p[j++].src=a[i];}}
}

function MM_swapImgRestore() { //v3.0
  var i,x,a=document.MM_sr; for(i=0;a&&i<a.length&&(x=a[i])&&x.oSrc;i++) x.src=x.oSrc;
}

function MM_findObj(n, d) { //v4.01
  var p,i,x;  if(!d) d=document; if((p=n.indexOf("?"))>0&&parent.frames.length) {
    d=parent.frames[n.substring(p+1)].document; n=n.substring(0,p);}
  if(!(x=d[n])&&d.all) x=d.all[n]; for (i=0;!x&&i<d.forms.length;i++) x=d.forms[i][n];
  for(i=0;!x&&d.layers&&i<d.layers.length;i++) x=MM_findObj(n,d.layers[i].document);
  if(!x && d.getElementById) x=d.getElementById(n); return x;
}

function MM_swapImage() { //v3.0
  var i,j=0,x,a=MM_swapImage.arguments; document.MM_sr=new Array; for(i=0;i<(a.length-2);i+=3)
   if ((x=MM_findObj(a[i]))!=null){document.MM_sr[j++]=x; if(!x.oSrc) x.oSrc=x.src; x.src=a[i+2];}
}
function MM_goToURL() { //v3.0
  var i, args=MM_goToURL.arguments; document.MM_returnValue = false;
  for (i=0; i<(args.length-1); i+=2) eval(args[i]+".location='"+args[i+1]+"'");
}
function MM_effectBlind(targetElement, duration, from, to, toggle)
{
	Spry.Effect.DoBlind(targetElement, {duration: duration, from: from, to: to, toggle: toggle});
}
function MM_showHideLayers() { //v9.0
  var i,p,v,obj,args=MM_showHideLayers.arguments;
  for (i=0; i<(args.length-2); i+=3) 
  with (document) if (getElementById && ((obj=getElementById(args[i]))!=null)) { v=args[i+2];
    if (obj.style) { obj=obj.style; v=(v=='show')?'visible':(v=='hide')?'hidden':v; }
    obj.visibility=v; }
}

	  <td colspan="2" id="fondoo"><table width="632" height="74" border="0" align="center" cellpadding="10" cellspacing="0" class="Textoschicos">
	    <tr>
	      <td width="612" height="34" class="Ubica">ADICH al D&iacute;a &gt; Noticias 2016</td>
        </tr>
	    <tr>
	      <td height="40" valign="top"><hr size="1" noshade>
	        <table width="600" align="center" bgcolor="#FFFFFF" class="Textoschicos">
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="3" colspan="2" valign="middle" bgcolor="#FFFFFF" class="Textosgrandes">ADICH INICIA A&Ntilde;O ACAD&Eacute;MICO 2017</td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="0" colspan="2" valign="top" bgcolor="#FFFFFF"><p><img src="noticias-2017/abril/Curso.JPG" width="300" height="205" class="flotar">Al dar a conocer el calendario acad&eacute;mico del presente a&ntilde;o,  la Dra. Carmen L&iacute;a Sol&iacute;s, directora m&eacute;dica de la instituci&oacute;n enfatiz&oacute; que &ldquo;la  actualizaci&oacute;n constante de los conocimientos en el tratamiento de la Diabetes  es una misi&oacute;n que ADICH orienta a los profesionales de la salud de Atenci&oacute;n  Primaria&rdquo;.</p>
	              <p>Este a&ntilde;o los cursos y cl&iacute;nicas que cuentan con el patrocinio  oficial del Ministerio de Salud (MINSAL), Universidad de Valpara&iacute;so,  Universidad del Desarrollo, Colegio de Nutricionistas de Chile y la  Federaci&oacute;n Internacional de Diabetes, se desarrollar&aacute;n por vez primera, en las  salas de la futura sede de ADICH, ubicada en Av. Seminario 46 y 48, comuna de  Providencia.                  </p>
	              <p>Las jornadas educativas que ser&aacute;n inauguradas por Mar&iacute;a Elena  Norambuena, Presidenta de la Instituci&oacute;n comenzar&aacute;n el pr&oacute;ximo Jueves 20 y  Viernes 21 deAbril con &ldquo;<strong>Desafios De La  Dietoterapia De Pacientes con Diabetes Mellitus&rdquo;, </strong>una actividad dirigida a  nutricionistas y estudiantes universitarias.<strong></strong> </p>
	              <p>Durante el a&ntilde;o, prestigiados profesionales de la salud continuar&aacute;n  profundizando en diversos temas, abordando la importancia de mantener las  glicemias en niveles estables para evitar las complicaciones de la enfermedad.  Entre los temas a tratar estar&aacute;n: <strong>&ldquo;Cl&iacute;nicas  Pr&aacute;cticas En Diabetes: Visi&oacute;n Adich&rdquo;</strong> (25 y 26 mayo); <strong>Curso de Podolog&iacute;a Orientada al Diab&eacute;tico</strong> (23 Junio); <strong>Curso de Educadores En Diabetes y  Enfermedades Cr&oacute;nicas</strong> (27 -28 Julio); <strong>Congreso  de Educadores en Diabetes y Enfermedades Cr&oacute;nicas y Entrega Del Premio Doctor  Canessa</strong> (23 y Viernes 24 noviembre) distinci&oacute;n que destaca las&nbsp; mejores experiencias de trabajos realizados  en pacientes diab&eacute;ticos,
                  </p>
	              Asimismo, la presidenta destaca el <strong>&ldquo;Segundo Encuentro Nacional De Pacientes Diab&eacute;ticos</strong>que se realizar&aacute;  el 25 de agosto, dirigido a pacientes diab&eacute;ticos y sus familias,  cumpliendo&nbsp; de esa manera ADICH, la capacitaci&oacute;n  permanente de la instituci&oacute;n a socios y pacientes.</td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="3" colspan="2" valign="middle" bgcolor="#FFFFFF"><hr size="1" noshade></td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="3" colspan="2" valign="middle" bgcolor="#FFFFFF" class="Textosgrandes">JURAMENTO DE NUEVAS VOLUNTARIAS</td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="0" colspan="2" valign="top" bgcolor="#FFFFFF"><p><img src="noticias-2017/enero/Toma de Juramento 1..jpg" width="300" height="205" class="flotar">Al conmemorar 40 a&ntilde;os de labor, ADICH realiz&oacute; la Ceremonia de  Juramento de la Nuevas Voluntarias de ADICH presidida por la presidenta, M.  Elena Norambuena y la directora de la instituci&oacute;n, Victoria Caldera,  coordinadora del voluntariado, a fines de diciembre pasado.</p>
                  <p class="MsoNormal">Al tomar el Juramento a las nuevas voluntarias, la se&ntilde;ora  Victoria, quien tambi&eacute;n vive con la condici&oacute;n de diabetes tipo 1 y hace 24 a&ntilde;os  se dedica a servir a la comunidad en ADICH, enfatiz&oacute;: <strong>&ldquo;Un  voluntario debe destacarse por su esp&iacute;ritu solidario y distinguirse por una  comprometida vocaci&oacute;n de servicio&rdquo;.</strong></p>
                  <p class="MsoNormal">Con entusiasmo, la directora felicit&oacute; a las nuevas  voluntarias, <strong>Patricia Johnson, Margarita  Planduria y Patricia Vergara. </strong>Destac&oacute; que todas  ellas,&nbsp; tienen el t&iacute;tulo de Educadoras en  Diabetes, se encuentran capacitadas para tomar test de glicemias, escuchar con  calidez y responder las consultas de los socios y pacientes, respecto al  autocuidado de esta enfermedad metab&oacute;lica, derivando si la ocasi&oacute;n lo amerita,  a los profesionales de la salud de la instituci&oacute;n.</p>
                <p class="MsoNormal">Finalmente, la coordinadora enfatiz&oacute; la importancia de fomentar  la amistad, el respeto mutuo, la responsabilidad, la tolerancia y la lealtad  entre las personas que integran el Voluntariado.</p></td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="3" colspan="2" valign="middle" bgcolor="#FFFFFF"><img src="noticias-2017/enero/grupo3.jpg" width="293" height="188"> <img src="noticias-2017/enero/grupo 2.jpg" width="292" height="186"></td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="3" colspan="2" valign="middle" bgcolor="#FFFFFF"><hr size="1" noshade></td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="3" colspan="2" valign="middle" bgcolor="#FFFFFF" class="Textosgrandes">DON FRANCISCO ENTREGA IMPORTANTE MENSAJE  LOS PACIENTES DIAB&Eacute;TICOS</td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="0" colspan="2" valign="top" bgcolor="#FFFFFF"><p><img src="noticias-2016/nov/don-francisco.jpg" width="250" height="160" class="flotar">El animador Mario  Kreutzberger, &quot;Don Francisco&quot;, se sum&oacute; a la iniciativa  <em><strong>&nbsp;&ldquo;Alianza por un Chile sin Diabetes&rdquo;</strong></em>, enviando&nbsp; un mensaje a trav&eacute;s de un video, y posteriormente a trav&eacute;s  de un tweet desde su cuenta personal @DonFranciscoTV. Cabe se&ntilde;alar que el  gestor de la Telet&oacute;n es paciente diab&eacute;tico. <a href="https://youtu.be/syeEaWIf9V0" target="_blank">Ver Video</a></p></td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="3" colspan="2" valign="middle" bgcolor="#FFFFFF"><hr size="1" noshade></td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="3" colspan="2" valign="middle" bgcolor="#FFFFFF" class="Textosgrandes">MINISTRA DE SALUD  INAUGURA XV FERIA DE LA DIABETES DE ADICH Y ANUNCIA PUESTA EN  MARCHA DE &ldquo;ALIANZA POR UN CHILE SIN DIABETES&rdquo; <a href="https://goo.gl/photos/nicwHxNGWs3Wufj37" target="_blank"><strong>Ver Galer&iacute;a</strong></a></td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="3" colspan="2" valign="top" bgcolor="#FFFFFF"><img src="noticias-2016/nov/MINISTRA DE SALUD C CASTILLO (2).jpg" width="598" height="347"></td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="0" colspan="2" valign="top" bgcolor="#FFFFFF"><p>La Ministra  de Salud, Carmen Castillo, junto al Alcalde de la Ilustre Municipalidad de  &Ntilde;u&ntilde;oa, Andr&eacute;s Zarhi, la presidenta de la Asociaci&oacute;n de Diab&eacute;ticos de Chile  (ADICH) Mar&iacute;a Elena Norambuena, inauguraron la tradicional &ldquo;XV Feria de la Diabetes  ADICH 2016&rdquo; en Plaza de &Ntilde;u&ntilde;oa en el marco de la celebraci&oacute;n del D&iacute;a Mundial de  la Diabetes.</p>
	              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:18.75pt;line-height:18.9pt;background:white;"><span style="font-family:'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size:10.5pt; ">&ldquo;La  diabetes es una de las enfermedades no transmisibles que m&aacute;s nos preocupa&rdquo;,  donde la prevenci&oacute;n juega un papel fundamental, se&ntilde;al&oacute; la Ministra Carmen Castillo.  A&ntilde;adi&oacute; que entre los factores de riesgo est&aacute;n &ldquo;el sedentarismo, la obesidad y  la mala calidad de la alimentaci&oacute;n. Pero si nosotros nos cuidamos, nos  alimentamos adecuadamente, hacemos educaci&oacute;n f&iacute;sica y evitamos el sedentarismo,  de alguna manera vamos a poder evitar la enfermedad&rdquo;.</span></p>
                  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.9pt;background:white;"><span style="font-family:'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size:10.5pt; ">Cada 14  de noviembre, la Federaci&oacute;n Internacional de Diabetes (FID), de la cual es  miembro la Asociaci&oacute;n de Diab&eacute;ticos de Chile, se suma a esta celebraci&oacute;n  mundial. Este a&ntilde;o el lema de la FDI es <strong>&ldquo;Ojo  con la Diabetes&rdquo;,</strong> por lo cual, la instituci&oacute;n realiz&oacute; diversas actividades en  beneficio de la comunidad, enfocadas en la detecci&oacute;n temprana de la diabetes  tipo 2 y en reducir el riesgo de complicaciones. &ldquo;Mientras m&aacute;s temprano sea  diagnosticada la enfermedad, la persona inicie su tratamiento, m&aacute;s se asegura  la prevenci&oacute;n de graves complicaciones&rdquo;, afirma Mar&iacute;a Elena Norambuena,  presidenta de la instituci&oacute;n.</span></p>
                  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.9pt;background:white;">&nbsp;</p>
                  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.9pt;background:white;"><span style="font-family:'Arial','sans-serif'; font-size:10.5pt; ">En  el&nbsp;D&iacute;a Mundial de la Diabetes,  la Ministra de Salud, Carmen Castillo, dio a conocer una cruzada intersectorial  que busca prevenir la enfermedad y mejorar la calidad de vida de quienes la  padecen.&nbsp; Se trata de la &ldquo;<strong>Alianza por un Chile sin Diabetes&rdquo;</strong>,  un grupo de trabajo que re&uacute;ne a diversos actores del mundo cient&iacute;fico,  acad&eacute;mico, gubernamental y agrupaciones ciudadanas para apoyar la difusi&oacute;n, el  conocimiento sobre la enfermedad, as&iacute; como aportar a su prevenci&oacute;n y cuidado.  En esta nueva iniciativaparticipan la Sociedad Chilena de Endocrinolog&iacute;a y  Diabetes; Sociedad Chilena de Pediatr&iacute;a; Asociaci&oacute;n de Diab&eacute;ticos de Chile;  Fundaci&oacute;n de Diabetes Juvenil; Pontificia Universidad Cat&oacute;lica de Chile;  Universidad de Chile; Universidad del Desarrollo; Embajada de Dinamarca; el Ministerio  de Salud y la Organizaci&oacute;n Panamericana de la Salud.</span> <a href="dmd-2016.html">Leer m&aacute;s</a></p>
                  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:18.9pt;background:white;"><img src="noticias-2016/nov/AUTORIDADES-3.jpg" width="598" height="397"></p></td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="1" colspan="2" valign="top" bgcolor="#FFFFFF"><h5 style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Geneva, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Tahoma; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><em><strong>La Ministra de Salud, Carmen Castillo acompa&ntilde;ada por el Alcalde I. M. de &Ntilde;u&ntilde;oa, Andr&eacute;s Zahri, Pdta. M. Elena Norambuena, Dra. Carmen L&iacute;a Sol&iacute;s, Directora m&eacute;dica, ambas de Adich, Embajador de Dinamarca, Jesper Ferlov Andersen, Dra. Carmen Gloria Aylwin, Presidenta de Soched, C&eacute;sar Velasco Director ejecutivo &nbsp;FDJ y H&eacute;ctor Alegr&iacute;a, Director ejecutivo de ADICH.</strong></em><strong></strong></h5></td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="3" colspan="2" valign="middle" bgcolor="#FFFFFF"><hr size="1" noshade></td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="3" colspan="2" valign="middle" bgcolor="#FFFFFF" class="Textosgrandes"><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;"><strong><span style="line-height:107%; font-size:12.0pt; ">LUNES 14 DE NOVIEMBRE</span></strong></p>
	              ADICH  CELEBRA EL DIA MUNDIAL DE LA DIABETES (<a href="noticias-2016/nov/Programa-DMD.pdf" target="_blank">Ver Programa</a>)</td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="3" colspan="2" valign="top" bgcolor="#FFFFFF"><p><a href="https://goo.gl/photos/xBLANc59jYHCSVfB7" target="_blank"><img src="noticias-2016/oct/dmd.jpg" width="270" height="203" class="flotar"></a><strong>Ex&aacute;menes gratuitos,  de glicemia, fondo de ojo y de presi&oacute;n arterial tendr&aacute; el p&uacute;blico que concurra a la  &ldquo;XV Feria de la Diabetes de ADICH&rdquo; que se realizar&aacute; en Plaza de &Ntilde;u&ntilde;oa.</strong> <strong><span style="line-height:107%; font-size:12.0pt; ">LUNES</span></strong></p>
	              <p><strong><span style="line-height:107%; font-size:12.0pt; ">&ldquo;Ojo con la Diabetes&rdquo;</span></strong><span style="font-size:12.0pt; "> es el lema de la  Federaci&oacute;n Internacional de Diabetes (FID) para celebrar el D&iacute;a Mundial de la  Diabetes 2016 y a la cual, se une, la Asociaci&oacute;n de Diab&eacute;ticos de Chile,  organizando la <strong>XV FERIA DE LA DIABETES</strong>&rdquo;.</span></p>
	              <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt; ">Este a&ntilde;o la FID sustenta la campa&ntilde;a mundial en <strong>dos mensajes clave</strong>.  El primero, dice qu&eacute; la&nbsp;<strong>detecci&oacute;n de la diabetes tipo 2</strong>&nbsp;es importante  para modificar su avance y reducir el riesgo de complicaciones y el segundo,  enfatiza en que la&nbsp;<strong>detecci&oacute;n temprana de sus complicaciones, </strong>es una  parte fundamental para el control de la diabetes tipo 1 y 2.</span></p>
	              <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt; ">Entre  las 11.00 y 18.00 horas, las voluntarias y colaboradores de ADICH atender&aacute;n a  todas las personas que concurran a esta feria en la Plaza de &Ntilde;u&ntilde;oa, tomando controles  preventivos de salud en forma gratuita, como </span><span style="font-size:12.0pt; ">glicemias,  fondo de ojo, hipertensi&oacute;n arterial, explicando  con charlas educativas la importancia del temprano diagn&oacute;stico de la Diabetes  tipo 2 para reducir el riesgo de futuras y graves complicaciones, informa la  doctora Carmen L&iacute;a Sol&iacute;s, directora m&eacute;dica de ADICH.<br>
                <a href="noticias_2016.html#">Leer m&aacute;s</a></span></p></td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="3" colspan="2" valign="middle" bgcolor="#FFFFFF"><hr size="1" noshade></td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="3" colspan="2" valign="middle" bgcolor="#FFFFFF" class="Textosgrandes"><p>NUEVA FARMACIA ADICH</p></td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">
	            <td height="3" colspan="2" valign="top" bgcolor="#FFFFFF"><p><a href="https://goo.gl/photos/xBLANc59jYHCSVfB7" target="_blank"><img src="noticias-2016/oct/Farmacia ADICH2.jpg" width="270" height="203" class="flotar"></a><span style="font-size:12.0pt; ">Al  celebrar los 40 a&ntilde;os de la Asociaci&oacute;n de Diab&eacute;ticos de Chile ya podemos decir,  con orgullo, que es un hecho la promesa realizada por esta instituci&oacute;n a sus  socios y p&uacute;blico en general: la FARMACIA ADICH abri&oacute; sus puertas el pasado 21  de Septiembre; luego de un largo camino, esperando siempre mantener una  atenci&oacute;n cercana y precios m&aacute;s convenientes.</span></p>
	              <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt; ">&ldquo;Iremos  renov&aacute;ndonos y esperamos que nuestros socios, junto a todo aquel que nos  prefiera, valore nuestra labor y esfuerzo por tener los mejores precios y una  atenci&oacute;n profesional en relaci&oacute;n a los productos, manejo y tratamientos de la  Diabetes &rdquo; expresa, H&eacute;ctor Alegr&iacute;a Heyser, Director&nbsp;Ejecutivo de ADICH.</span>
                  </p>
	              <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:normal;background:white;"><span style="font-size:12.0pt; ">&nbsp;</span></p>
<span style="font-size:12.0pt; ">Asimismo,  la farmacia cuenta con un Qu&iacute;mico Farmac&eacute;utico permanente, capacitado para  aclarar todo tipo dudas, como tambi&eacute;n con nuestro voluntariado y educadoras en  diabetes, que pueden ofrecer una completa orientaci&oacute;n y educaci&oacute;n en temas  relacionados con las insulinas, medicamentos y&nbsp;  gluc&oacute;metros.</span>
                  <p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:normal;background:white;"><span style="font-size:12.0pt; ">&nbsp;</span></p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt; ">&ldquo;Otro  desaf&iacute;o a corto plazo y ventajoso para toda muestra comunidad es que la  Farmacia ADICH tiene la posibilidad de incorporar medicamentos ajenos a la  diabetes, para lo cual d&iacute;a a d&iacute;a nos esforzaremos en ir abasteci&eacute;ndonos de m&aacute;s  productos de uso habitual y, de esta manera, dar una atenci&oacute;n integral a  nuestros socios y p&uacute;blico en general&quot;, expresa, el Director Ejecutivo.</span>                </p>
                <p><span style="font-size:12.0pt; ">El  horario de atenci&oacute;n continuada es de lunes a viernes de 10:00 a 18:30 horas y  los d&iacute;as s&aacute;bados de 10:00 a 12:30 horas.</span></p></td>
              </tr>
	          <tr bordercolor="#FFFFFF" bgcolor="#FF9D38">

                XV CLINICAS EN DIABETES Y DE CURSO DE EDUCADORES<br>
	            <a href="https://goo.gl/photos/xBLANc59jYHCSVfB7" target="_blank">Ver Galer&iacute;a</a> &nbsp;&nbsp;/  &nbsp;&nbsp;<a href="curso-diabetes-2016.html">Ver Conferencias</a></p></td>
