  <div id="mainbody">
    <div id="breadcrumbs"><a href="https://www.commerce.gov">Commerce</a> &#8250; <a href="http://www.commerce.gov/os">Office of the Secretary</a> &#8250; <a href="http://www.osec.doc.gov/cfo/">CFO/ASA</a> &#8250;  <a href="../default.htm">OPOG</a> &gt; <!-- InstanceBeginEditable name="breadcrumbs" -->Privacy<!-- InstanceEndEditable --></div>
    <!--end breadcrumbs -->
    <div id="pagetitle">
      <h1><!-- InstanceBeginEditable name="Page Title" --><a name="content" id="content"></a>Privacy Program<!-- InstanceEndEditable --></h1>
    </div>
    <!--end pagetitle -->
    <div id="lefttext"><!-- InstanceBeginEditable name="lefttext" -->
				
			<p>The Privacy Office is responsible for the development and maintenance of privacy policies, procedures, and guidance essential to safeguarding the collection, access, use, dissemination, and storage of personally identifiable information (PII), business identifiable information (BII), and Privacy Act information in accordance with the Privacy Act of 1974, the E-Government Act of 2002, Federal Information Security Modernization Act (FISMA) of 2014, and policy and guidance issued by the President and Office of Management and Budget (OMB).</p>
	  <table width="95%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
			  <caption>
			    
        </caption>
			  <tr><td width="32%" valign="top"><p align="center"><a href="Privacy_Office.html"><img src="../images/DOC Privacy 116 x 49.png" width="126" height="59" alt="privacy icon" longdesc="Privacy_Office.html" /></a></p>
			    <div id="CollapsiblePanel1" class="CollapsiblePanel">
			        <div class="CollapsiblePanel" tabindex="0">
                       <span title="Click here for Privacy Office information">
                        <h2 align="center">DEPARTMENT PRIVACY OFFICE</h2>
                      </span>
                       <p>The Department&rsquo;s Privacy Office  within the Office of the Secretary, Chief Financial Officer and Assistant  Secretary for Administration, Office of Privacy and Open Government.<span title="Click here for Privacy Office information">
                       </span>
                       </p></div>
			      <div class="CollapsiblePanelContent">
			        <div class="CollapsiblePanelContent">
			          <div align="left">
			            <ul >
			              <li><a href="Privacy_Office.html#SAOP">Senior Agency Official for Privacy/Chief Privacy Officer</a></li>
			              <li><a href="Privacy_Office.html#PODeputy">Deputy Director for Departmental Privacy Operations </a></li>
			              <li><a href="Privacy_Office.html#PAODeputy">Deputy Director for Privacy Act Operations</a></li>
			              <li><a href="Privacy_Office.html#Mission">Commerce Privacy Mission Statement</a></li>
			              <li><a href="Privacy_Office.html#PA">Authority &amp; Responsibilities</a></li>
			              <li><a href="Privacy_Office.html#Council">Privacy Council</a></li>
			              <li><a href="Privacy_Office.html#taskforce">DOC PII Breach Response Task Force</a></li>
			              <li><a href="Privacy_Office.html#info">Contact Information</a></li>
		                </ul>
		              </div>
		            </div>
			      </div>
		        </div>
			  <td width="2%" valign="top">&nbsp;</td>
                <td width="32%" valign="top"><p align="center"><a href="compliance.html"><img src="../images/data_privacy.png" width="95" height="65" alt="compliance icon" longdesc="compliance.html" /></a></p>
                  <div id="CollapsiblePanel2" class="CollapsiblePanel">
                    <div class="CollapsiblePanel" tabindex="0">
                                                                       
                       <span title="Click here for Privacy Compliance information"> <h2 align="center">PRIVACY COMPLIANCE</h2><span/>
                        
                        <p align="left">An overview of the Department’s privacy compliance process and related documents, which includes the Privacy Threshold Analysis (PTA) and Privacy Impact Assessments (PIAs).</p><span title="Click here for Privacy Compliance information">
                        </span></div>
                     <div class="CollapsiblePanelContent">
                       <div align="left">
                         <blockquote></blockquote>
                         <ul class="smaller">
                           <li><a href="compliance.html#pta">Privacy Threshold Analysis (PTA) Requirement</a></li>
                           <li><a href="PTA_Template.pdf">PTA Template</a></li>
                           <li><a href="compliance.html#pia">Privacy Impact Assessment (PIA) Requirement</a></li>
                           <li><a href="PIA_Template.pdf">PIA Template</a></li>
                           <li><a href="PIA Process 2016.pdf">PIA Process Flowchart</a></li>
                           <li><a href="PIA Brochure.pdf" title="PIA Templates and Brochures">PIA Brochure</a></li>
                           <li><a href="compliance.html#approvedpias">Privacy Impact Assessments by Bureau/Operating Unit</a>
                             <ul>
                               <li><a href="OS PIAs/social media PIA.pdf">Department-wide PIA - Signed version</a></li>
                               <li><a href="BIS-pias.html">Bureau of Industry and Security (BIS) PIAs</a></li>
                               <li>International  Trade Administration (ITA): Coming Soon</li>
                               <li>Minority Business Development Agency (MBDA): Coming Soon</li>
                               <li><a href="NIST-pias.html">National Institute of Standards  and Technology (NIST) PIAs</a><u> </u></li>
                               <li><a href="NOAA-pias.html" target="_blank">National  Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) PIAs</a><u> </u></li>
                               <li><a href="NTIA-pias.html">National Telecommunications and Information Administration (NTIA) PIAs</a></li>
                               <li><a href="NTIS-pias.html">National Technical Information Service (NTIS) PIAs</a></li>
                               <li><a href="OIG-pias.html">Office of Inspector General (OIG) PIAs</a> </li>
                               <li><a href="os-pias.html">Office  of the Secretary (OS) PIAs</a><u> </u></li>
                               <li><a href="Census-pias.html">U.S. Census Bureau PIAs</a></li>
                               <li><a href="PTO-pias.html" target="_blank">US Patent  and Trademark (USPTO)&nbsp;PIAs</a></li>
                             </ul>

                </div></td>
			    <td width="2%" valign="top">&nbsp;</td>
                <td width="32%" valign="top"><p align="center"><a href="PII_BII.html"><img src="../images/PII-BII.png" width="95" height="65" alt="PII and BII icon" longdesc="PII_BII.html" /></a></p>
                  <div id="CollapsiblePanel3" class="CollapsiblePanel">
                    <div class="CollapsiblePanel" tabindex="0">
                        <span title="Click here for safeguarding PII/BII information">
                        <h2 align="center">SAFEGUARDING INFORMATION</h2>
                        </span>
                    <p>Properly safeguarding personally  identifiable information (PII) and business identifiable information (BII).</p></div>
                    <div class="CollapsiblePanelContent">
                      <div class="CollapsiblePanelContent">
                        <div align="left">
                          <ul>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var redirectUrl;
        function ShowHiddenMenu(idmenu) {

            if ($("." + idmenu)[0].style.right != '-15%') {
                $("." + idmenu + " .touchToOpen a:first").addClass("selected");
                $("." + idmenu).animate({ right: '-15%' }, 1000, 'swing');
            }
            else {
                $("." + idmenu + " .touchToOpen a:first").removeClass("selected");
                $("." + idmenu).animate({ right: '-100%' }, 1000, 'swing');
            }
        }

        function showPopUpRedirection(anchor, urlRedirect, params) {

            $.ajax({
                url: '/api/public/UpdateStatisticsClick.aspx',
                data: { p: params },
                type: 'GET',
                success: function (data) {
                    console.log(data.response);
                },
                error: function (data) {
                    console.log(data.response);
                }
            });


            if (!urlRedirect.match("^http://www.msdmanuals.com/")) {
                $("a[id^='btnContinue_']").attr('href', urlRedirect);
                //$("#btnContinue").attr('href', url);
                //redirectUrl = url;
                ShowModal("#dialogRedirect");
            } else {
                window.open(urlRedirect);
            }

<h2>Cáncer de Piel: Melanoma <br/><span>Cáncer de Piel: Melanoma</span></h2>
<p class="campoDoctor">Dr. Lorem ipsum</p>
<p>El melanoma es un tipo de cáncer que se da en las células que producen el pigmento en la piel. A dichas células se las denomina melanocitos y están localizadas principalmente en la capa más superficial de la piel, que es la epidermis.</p>

<h2>Enfermedad Arterial Periférica <br/><span>Enfermedad Arterial Periférica</span></h2>
<p class="campoDoctor">Dr. Lorem ipsum</p>
<p>La Enfermedad Arterial Periférica es una enfermedad en la que el exceso de colesterol y otras grasas que circulan en la sangre se acumulan en las paredes de las arterias.</p>

<h2>Colesterol <br/><span>Colesterol</span></h2>
<p class="campoDoctor">Dr. Lorem ipsum</p>

                <img title="newsletter" alt="newsletter" src="/Assets/images/home/sobre-newsletter.png"></a>
                
<div class="cajaEmail">
    <script type="text/javascript">
        function validateChkPrivacy(oSrc, args) {
            args.IsValid = $('#ctl00_ctl00_ctl00_cphBannerNewsletter_OptIn_chkPrivacy').is(':checked');
        }

        function CheckDatas() {
            var msjs = '';
            if ($('#ctl00_ctl00_ctl00_cphBannerNewsletter_OptIn_ctrlEmail input').val() === '' || $('#ctl00_ctl00_ctl00_cphBannerNewsletter_OptIn_ctrlEmail input').val() === 'E-MAIL') {
                msjs = "Debe ingresar una dirección de correo";
            }
            else {
                var emailRegex = /^([a-zA-Z0-9])+([a-zA-Z0-9._%+-])+@([a-zA-Z0-9_.-])+\.(([a-zA-Z]){2,6})$/;
                if (!emailRegex.test($('#ctl00_ctl00_ctl00_cphBannerNewsletter_OptIn_ctrlEmail input').val())) {
                    msjs = "La dirección de correo tiene un formato incorrecto";
                }
            }
            if (!$('#ctl00_ctl00_ctl00_cphBannerNewsletter_OptIn_chkPrivacy').is(':checked')) {
                if (msjs !== '') {
                    msjs += '\r\n';
                }
                msjs += "Debe aceptar la Política de privacidad";
            }

            if (msjs !== '') {
                alert(msjs);
                return false;
            }
        }
    </script>
    <div class="boxCheck">
        <p><span>RECIBE NUESTRA NEWSLETTER</span></p>
        
        <div class="checkBox">
            <div class="inputCheck"></div>
            <input id="ctl00_ctl00_ctl00_cphBannerNewsletter_OptIn_chkPrivacy" type="checkbox" name="ctl00$ctl00$ctl00$cphBannerNewsletter$OptIn$chkPrivacy" /><label for="ctl00_ctl00_ctl00_cphBannerNewsletter_OptIn_chkPrivacy">Acepto la <a href="/mas-informacion/politica-privacidad.html">Política de privacidad</a></label>
        </div>
    </div>
    &nbsp;
    <div class="boxEmail">
        <div id="ctl00_ctl00_ctl00_cphBannerNewsletter_OptIn_ctrlEmail" class="QC_Container EmailControl">
	<div class="QC_MarcoPregunta">
		<div class="QC_Etiqueta">
			<label for="ctl00_ctl00_ctl00_cphBannerNewsletter_OptIn_ctrlEmail_ctrlEmail_inputControl"></label>

		</div><div class="QC_Notas">

		</div>
	</div>
</div>
        <div class="btnNewsletter">
            <input type="submit" name="ctl00$ctl00$ctl00$cphBannerNewsletter$OptIn$btnRegister" value="Enviar" onclick="CheckDatas();WebForm_DoPostBackWithOptions(new WebForm_PostBackOptions(&quot;ctl00$ctl00$ctl00$cphBannerNewsletter$OptIn$btnRegister&quot;, &quot;&quot;, true, &quot;optIn&quot;, &quot;&quot;, false, false))" id="ctl00_ctl00_ctl00_cphBannerNewsletter_OptIn_btnRegister" /></div>

                </div>
            </footer>

        var hostRealRedirect = document.forms[0].action.replace('https://www.msdsalud.es', '');

		<li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-520"><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/animal-health/protecting-animal-health/">Protecting Animal Health</a></li>

				<article id="post-47" class="post-47 page type-page status-publish hentry">
			<div  class="fsn-row full-width-container fsn-58e55d7800a4f light" style="background-repeat:repeat;background-position:left top;background-attachment:scroll;background-size:auto;"><div class="row"><div class="col-sm-12"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d7800c46 light"><script>jQuery(document).ready(function(){jQuery("<img/>").attr("src", "http://s3.amazonaws.com/msd-assets/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/05105421/MRK_Banners_AccessToHealth_83_v3.jpg").load(function() {jQuery(this).remove();jQuery('.fsn-overview-header-content').addClass('active')});});</script><div class="fsn-overview-header fsn-58e55d780168e" style="background-image: url(http://s3.amazonaws.com/msd-assets/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/05105421/MRK_Banners_AccessToHealth_83_v3.jpg);"><div class="fsn-overview-header-left-link"><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/our-approach/">Our Approach</a></div><div class="fsn-overview-header-right-link"><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/environmental-sustainability/">Environmental Sustainability</a></div><div class="fsn-overview-header-content"><h4>Overview</h4><h1>Access to Health</h1><h2 style = "font-size:32px">We aspire to improve access to health by discovering, developing and providing innovative products and services that save and improve lives. </h2></div><div class="fsn-overview-header-scroll-to">Scroll</div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="fsn-row full-width-row fsn-58e55d7801b54 light" style="background-repeat:repeat;background-position:left top;background-attachment:scroll;background-size:auto;"><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="col-sm-12"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d7801e26 light"><div class="fsn-text fsn-58e55d7802059">
<p style="text-align: left;"><span style="color: #ffffff;"><strong>Material Topics</strong>: <a style="color: #ffffff;" href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/?p=75">Anti-Counterfeiting</a>, <a style="color: #ffffff;" href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/?p=65">Bioethics</a>, <a style="color: #ffffff;" href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/?p=49">Capacity Building</a>, <a style="color: #ffffff;" href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/?p=44">Citizenship/Community Relations</a>, <a style="color: #ffffff;" href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/?p=65">Clinical Trial Ethics</a>, <a style="color: #ffffff;" href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/?p=71">Continuity of Supply</a>, <a style="color: #ffffff;" href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/?p=59">Disease Focus</a>, <a style="color: #ffffff;" href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/?p=81">Health Literacy &amp; Adherence</a>, <a style="color: #ffffff;" href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/?p=75">Intellectual Property</a>, <a style="color: #ffffff;" href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/?p=71">Local Development</a>, <a style="color: #ffffff;" href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/?p=84">Patient Empowerment</a>, <a style="color: #ffffff;" href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/?p=85">Philanthropy</a>, <a style="color: #ffffff;" href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/?p=78">Pricing and Commercialization</a>, <a style="color: #ffffff;" href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/research-development/product-and-patient-safety/">Product Safety, Product Quality</a>, <a style="color: #ffffff;" href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/?p=59">R&amp;D</a>, <a style="color: #ffffff;" href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/?p=65">Trial &amp; Post-Trial Access</a>, <a style="color: #ffffff;" href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/?p=66">Use of Laboratory Animals</a></span></p>
</div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="fsn-row full-width-row fsn-58e55d780228a overview-row light" style="background-repeat:repeat;background-position:left top;background-attachment:scroll;background-size:auto;"><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="col-sm-4"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d78024e0 light"><div class="fsn-card overview fsn-58e55d780269c"><div class="card-content"><h3>HELPING THE WORLD BE WELL</h3>
<p>We are working to find new ways to bring our medicines and vaccines to more people around the world, and to make them as accessible and affordable as possible for those who need them. We work with local health care providers to understand product need and use, and invest in efforts to educate patients.</p>
</div><div class="card-image"><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/pricing-commercialization/"><img src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/msd-assets/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/05105758/PricingCommercialization_304X132_v1.jpg" width="304" height="132" alt="PricingCommercialization_304X132_v1"></a></div><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/pricing-commercialization/" class="card-button">LEARN MORE</a></div></div></div><div class="col-sm-4"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d7803042 light"><div class="fsn-card overview fsn-58e55d780320a"><div class="card-content"><h3>ACTIVELY PURSUING SOLUTIONS TO UNMET MEDICAL NEEDS THROUGH R&amp;D </h3>
<p>Our collaborations in R&amp;D expand our capacity to address unmet needs in emerging markets and least-developed countries. We will continue to pursue opportunities to provide access to compound libraries and molecules to spur the development of new products, and we are committed to addressing unmet medical needs.</p>
</div><div class="card-image"><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/research-development/"><img src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/msd-assets/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/05105754/ResearchDevelopment_304X132.jpg" width="304" height="132" alt="ResearchDevelopment_304X132"></a></div><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/research-development/" class="card-button">LEARN MORE</a></div></div></div><div class="col-sm-4"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d7803b1b light"><div class="fsn-card overview fsn-58e55d7803cda"><div class="card-content"><h3>DISCOVERING WAYS TO HELP ALLEVIATE THE TOP GLOBAL BURDENS OF DISEASE</h3>
<p>We believe we have a responsibility to help improve access to medicines, vaccines and quality health care worldwide, thereby helping to reduce the burden of disease in areas of the world that need it most. Toward this end, we collaborate with a variety of stakeholders to contribute our expertise and knowledge.</p>
</div><div class="card-image"><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/key-initiatives/"><img src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/msd-assets/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/05105800/Key_Intatives_304X132_v1.jpg" width="304" height="132" alt="Key_Intatives_304X132_v1"></a></div><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/key-initiatives/" class="card-button">LEARN MORE</a></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="fsn-row full-width-row fsn-58e55d7804631 light" style="background-repeat:repeat;background-position:left top;background-attachment:scroll;background-size:auto;"><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="col-sm-12"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d780482a light"><div class="fsn-subheadline fsn-58e55d78049c1"><h4>Access to Health At-a-Glance</h4></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="fsn-row full-width-row fsn-58e55d7804b41 hidden-print light" style="background-repeat:repeat;background-position:left top;background-attachment:scroll;background-size:auto;"><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="col-sm-8"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d7804d33 light"><div class="fsn-image fsn-58e55d78054ec align-none"><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/research-development/global-burden-of-disease/" class="image-button"><img src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/msd-assets/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/05105417/88-percent.jpg" width="653" height="156" alt="" class="img-responsive img-default"></a></div></div></div><div class="col-sm-4"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d7805862 light"><div class="fsn-image fsn-58e55d7805fa9 align-none"><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/key-initiatives/msd-for-mothers/" class="image-button"><img src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/msd-assets/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/05105419/MSD-for-mothers3.jpg" width="316" height="156" alt="" class="img-responsive src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/msd-assets/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/05105752/35-products.jpg" width="316" height="254" alt="" class="img-responsive img-default"></a></div></div></div><div class="col-sm-8"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d7806f95 light"><div class="fsn-image fsn-58e55d7807737 align-none"><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/key-initiatives/mectizan-donation-program/" class="image-button"><img fsn-58e55d780852d align-none"><img src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/msd-assets/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/05105342/access-to-health.png" width="981" height="421" alt="" class="img-responsive img-default"></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="fsn-row full-width-row fsn-58e55d780871d light" style="background-repeat:repeat;background-position:left top;background-attachment:scroll;background-size:auto;"><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="col-sm-12"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d7808910 light"><div class="fsn-subheadline fsn-58e55d7808a8b"><h4>Access to Health and the UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDG)</h4></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="fsn-row full-width-row fsn-58e55d7808c13 light" style="background-repeat:repeat;background-position:left top;background-attachment:scroll;background-size:auto;"><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="col-sm-6"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d7808e12 light"><div class="fsn-text fsn-58e55d7808f84">
<p>The interactive graphic below indicates which SDGs we are addressing with regard to our Access to Health efforts. Hovering over the icons will give you a description of the goal, with links to more information.</p>
</div></div></div><div class="col-sm-6"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d78090cf light"><div class="fsn-text fsn-58e55d7809242">

visible-xs"></div>		<script type="text/javascript">
		jQuery(document).ready(function(){
			jQuery('.sdg-element').on('hover', function(){
				if(jQuery(this).attr("data-show")=='true'){
					jQuery(".des-feed").css("background-color", jQuery(this).css("background-color"));
					jQuery(".des-feed").html(jQuery(this).find(".hidden").html());
				}
			});
		});
		
		jQuery(window).load(function(){
			var sdg_slider = jQuery('.fsn-overview-sdg-slider.flexslider').flexslider({
				animation: "slide",
				directionNav: true,
				controlNav: false,
				start: function(slider){
					var _this = slider.find('.flex-active-slide div');
					jQuery(".des-feed-mobile").css("background-color", _this.css("background-color"));
					jQuery(".des-feed-mobile").html(_this.find(".hidden").html());
				},
				after: function(slider) {
					var _this = slider.find('.flex-active-slide div');
					jQuery(".des-feed-mobile").css("background-color", _this.css("background-color"));
					jQuery(".des-feed-mobile").html(_this.find(".hidden").html());
				}
			});
		});
		</script>
		<div class="fsn-table fsn-58e55d780b28b   teal width-50" style="margin-bottom:20px;"><table class="table"><tr class="thead"><th colspan="6">Key Performance Indicators<sup>1</sup></th></tr><tr class="thead"><th>Research & Development</th><th>2011</th><th>2012</th><th>2013</th><th>2014</th><th>2015</th></tr>		<script type="text/javascript">
		jQuery(document).ready(function () {
						
			var chartColor = '';
			var backgroundColor = '#b9ebe9';
			var gridLineColor = '#cccccc';
			
			if(jQuery('body').hasClass('teal')) {
				chartColor = 'teal'
			}
			if(jQuery('body').hasClass('green')) {
				chartColor = 'green'
			}
			if(jQuery('body').hasClass('orange')) {
				chartColor = 'orange'
			}
			if(jQuery('body').hasClass('yellow')) {
				chartColor = 'yellow'
			}
			if(jQuery('body').hasClass('purple')) {
				chartColor = 'purple'
			}
			
			if(jQuery('#row58e55d780c987').closest('.fsn-table').hasClass('teal')) {
				chartColor = 'teal'
			}
			if(jQuery('#row58e55d780c987').closest('.fsn-table').hasClass('green')) {
				chartColor = 'green'
			}
			if(jQuery('#row58e55d780c987').closest('.fsn-table').hasClass('orange')) {
				chartColor = 'orange'
			}
			if(jQuery('#row58e55d780c987').closest('.fsn-table').hasClass('yellow')) {
				chartColor = 'yellow'
			}
			if(jQuery('#row58e55d780c987').closest('.fsn-table').hasClass('purple')) {
				chartColor = 'purple'
			}
			
			switch(chartColor) {
				case 'teal':
					backgroundColor = '#b7e2e3';
					break;
				case 'green':
					backgroundColor = '#d5e6a4';
					break;
				case 'orange':
					backgroundColor = '#ecc06d';
					break;
				case 'yellow':
					backgroundColor = '#f6e99f';
					break;
				case 'purple':
					backgroundColor = '#a37989';
					break;
			}
			
			if(jQuery('html').hasClass('lt-ie9')) {
				var chartProperties = {
					height: 110,
					spacingLeft: 20,
					spacingBottom: 20,
					backgroundColor: backgroundColor,
					style: {
			            fontFamily: 'Arial, sans-serif'
			        }
				}
				var yAxisProperties = {
					title: {
						text: ''
					},
					endOnTick: true,
					startOnTick: true,
					min: 0,
					max: 110,
					tickInterval: 28,
					labels: {
		                style: {
		                    fontSize:'8px'
		                },
						formatter: function () {
		                    return roundHighchartsLabel(this.value);
		                },
		                y: 4
		            },
		            gridLineColor:gridLineColor,
		            offset: 10		
				}
			} else {
				var chartProperties = {
					height: 110,
					backgroundColor: backgroundColor,
					style: {
			            fontFamily: 'Arial, sans-serif'
			        }
				}
				var yAxisProperties = {
					title: {
						text: ''
					},
					endOnTick: true,
					startOnTick: true,
					min: 0,
					max: 110,
					tickInterval: 28,
					labels: {
		                style: {
		                    fontSize:'8px'
		                },
						formatter: function () {
		                    return roundHighchartsLabel(this.value);
		                }
		            },
		            gridLineColor:gridLineColor					
				}
			}
			
			var chartOptions_highchart58e55d780ca2e =	{
				chart: chartProperties,
				title: {
					text: ''
				},
				yAxis: yAxisProperties,
		        xAxis: {
		            categories: [2011,2012,2013,2014,2015],
					labels: {
		                style: {
		                    fontSize:'8px'
		                }
		            },
		            tickColor:gridLineColor,
		            lineColor:gridLineColor
		        },
		        series: [{
		            data: [53,55,88,88,88],
		            color: '#233444'
		        }],
		        legend: {
					enabled: false
				},
		        credits: {
					enabled: false
				}
		    }
		    
		    jQuery('#row58e55d780c987').on('mouseover',function(){
				var chartTop = (jQuery('#row58e55d780c987').offset().top - jQuery('#row58e55d780c987').parent().offset().top) + jQuery('#row58e55d780c987').height();
				var chartWidth = jQuery('#row58e55d780c987').outerWidth() - jQuery('#row58e55d780c987').find('th:first').outerWidth();
				jQuery('#highchart58e55d780ca2e').css({'width':chartWidth+'px','top':chartTop+'px'});
				jQuery('#highchart58e55d780ca2e').highcharts(chartOptions_highchart58e55d780ca2e);
				jQuery('#highchart58e55d780ca2e').removeClass('hidden');
		    });
		    jQuery('#row58e55d780c987').on('mouseout',function(){
			    jQuery('#highchart58e55d780ca2e').highcharts().destroy();
				jQuery('#highchart58e55d780ca2e').addClass('hidden');
		    });
		});
		</script>

		jQuery(document).ready(function () {
						
			var chartColor = '';
			var backgroundColor = '#b9ebe9';
			var gridLineColor = '#cccccc';
			
			if(jQuery('body').hasClass('teal')) {
				chartColor = 'teal'
			}
			if(jQuery('body').hasClass('green')) {
				chartColor = 'green'
			}
			if(jQuery('body').hasClass('orange')) {
				chartColor = 'orange'
			}
			if(jQuery('body').hasClass('yellow')) {
				chartColor = 'yellow'
			}
			if(jQuery('body').hasClass('purple')) {
				chartColor = 'purple'
			}
			
			if(jQuery('#row58e55d780e31f').closest('.fsn-table').hasClass('teal')) {
				chartColor = 'teal'
			}
			if(jQuery('#row58e55d780e31f').closest('.fsn-table').hasClass('green')) {
				chartColor = 'green'
			}
			if(jQuery('#row58e55d780e31f').closest('.fsn-table').hasClass('orange')) {
				chartColor = 'orange'
			}
			if(jQuery('#row58e55d780e31f').closest('.fsn-table').hasClass('yellow')) {
				chartColor = 'yellow'
			}
			if(jQuery('#row58e55d780e31f').closest('.fsn-table').hasClass('purple')) {
				chartColor = 'purple'
			}
			
			switch(chartColor) {
				case 'teal':
					backgroundColor = '#b7e2e3';
					break;
				case 'green':
					backgroundColor = '#d5e6a4';
					break;
				case 'orange':
					backgroundColor = '#ecc06d';
					break;
				case 'yellow':
					backgroundColor = '#f6e99f';
					break;
				case 'purple':
					backgroundColor = '#a37989';
					break;
			}
			
			if(jQuery('html').hasClass('lt-ie9')) {
				var chartProperties = {
					height: 110,
					spacingLeft: 20,
					spacingBottom: 20,
					backgroundColor: backgroundColor,
					style: {
			            fontFamily: 'Arial, sans-serif'
			        }
				}
				var yAxisProperties = {
					title: {
						text: ''
					},
					endOnTick: true,
					startOnTick: true,
					min: 0,
					max: 123,
					tickInterval: 31,
					labels: {
		                style: {
		                    fontSize:'8px'
		                },
						formatter: function () {
		                    return roundHighchartsLabel(this.value);
		                },
		                y: 4
		            },
		            gridLineColor:gridLineColor,
		            offset: 10		
				}
			} else {
				var chartProperties = {
					height: 110,
					backgroundColor: backgroundColor,
					style: {
			            fontFamily: 'Arial, sans-serif'
			        }
				}
				var yAxisProperties = {
					title: {
						text: ''
					},
					endOnTick: true,
					startOnTick: true,
					min: 0,
					max: 123,
					tickInterval: 31,
					labels: {
		                style: {
		                    fontSize:'8px'
		                },
						formatter: function () {
		                    return roundHighchartsLabel(this.value);
		                }
		            },
		            gridLineColor:gridLineColor					
				}
			}
			
			var chartOptions_highchart58e55d780e3cc =	{
				chart: chartProperties,
				title: {
					text: ''
				},
				yAxis: yAxisProperties,
		        xAxis: {
		            categories: [2011,2012,2013,2014,2015],
					labels: {
		                style: {
		                    fontSize:'8px'
		                }
		            },
		            tickColor:gridLineColor,
		            lineColor:gridLineColor
		        },
		        series: [{
		            data: [97.8,71.4,61.3,52.3,80],
		            color: '#233444'
		        }],
		        legend: {
					enabled: false
				},
		        credits: {
					enabled: false
				}
		    }
		    
		    jQuery('#row58e55d780e31f').on('mouseover',function(){
				var chartTop = (jQuery('#row58e55d780e31f').offset().top - jQuery('#row58e55d780e31f').parent().offset().top) + jQuery('#row58e55d780e31f').height();
				var chartWidth = jQuery('#row58e55d780e31f').outerWidth() - jQuery('#row58e55d780e31f').find('th:first').outerWidth();
				jQuery('#highchart58e55d780e3cc').css({'width':chartWidth+'px','top':chartTop+'px'});
				jQuery('#highchart58e55d780e3cc').highcharts(chartOptions_highchart58e55d780e3cc);
				jQuery('#highchart58e55d780e3cc').removeClass('hidden');
		    });
		    jQuery('#row58e55d780e31f').on('mouseout',function(){
			    jQuery('#highchart58e55d780e3cc').highcharts().destroy();
				jQuery('#highchart58e55d780e3cc').addClass('hidden');
		    });
		});
		</script>

NR: Not reported.<br>
<sup>1</sup> Unless otherwise noted, data for the Access to Health section are reflective of our Human Health business only; information on our Animal Health business is reported separately.<br>
<sup>2</sup> As defined by the Institute for Health Metrics and Evaluation (IHME).<br>
<sup>3</sup> Candidates in our company’s research pipeline or under regulatory review are as of February 19, 2016, as reported in the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission for 10-K., page 16, filed on February 26, 2016. This includes candidates in Phase II or Phase III trials, or under regulatory review as of February 26, 2016. As candidates attain regulatory approval, they are removed from this pipeline view.<br>
<sup>4</sup> For information on product-development partnerships, visit the “Partnerships” tab at <a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/research-development/#tab-5591a965c9e82">http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/research-development/#tab-5591a965c9e82</a>.<br>
<sup>5</sup> Beginning in 2014, this figure includes recalls within our Animal Health business.<br>
<sup>6</sup> In 2014, we expanded our reporting to all of our products, including the various strengths and presentations that are sold or distributed through a partnership in local markets, to more accurately reflect our efforts to address local needs.<br>
<sup>7</sup> Data include new products and new indications.<br>
<sup>8</sup> Data include new products and new indications.<br>
<sup>9</sup> For information on new registrations by region, visit <a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/research-development/clinical-research/#tab-5591b7745c6c4">http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/research-development/clinical-research/#tab-5591b7745c6c4</a>.<br>
<sup>10</sup> For information on local regulatory agency GCP/PV training requests, visit <a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/research-development/clinical-research/">http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/research-development/clinical-research/</a>.<br>
<sup>11</sup> In 2013, we modified our key performance indicators for differential pricing so that we can more broadly capture and accurately reflect our support.<br>
<sup>12</sup> Differential pricing intended to facilitate access for the at-need population.<br>
<sup>13</sup> Our products include HIV treatments, vaccines and other patented products.<br>
<sup>14</sup> Countries as defined by the World Bank 2013 GNI Classification, including UN-defined “least developed countries.”<br>
<sup>15</sup> In 2013, we refined our support to prioritize and align resources to complement our core business strategy, which resulted in an overall decrease in funding.<br></th></tr>
</table></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="fsn-row full-width-row fsn-58e55d781f10d overview-footer light" style="background-image:url(http://s3.amazonaws.com/msd-assets/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/05105925/access-to-health-footer.jpg);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:center center;background-attachment:scroll;background-size:auto;"><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="col-sm-12"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d781f44f light"><div class="fsn-row full-width-row fsn-58e55d781f6c7 light" style="background-repeat:repeat;background-position:left top;background-attachment:scroll;background-size:auto;"><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="col-sm-4"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d781f8ff light"><div class="fsn-button standard fsn-58e55d781faf5"><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/key-initiatives/mectizan-donation-program/" class="btn btn-info btn-block">MECTIZAN Donations</a></div><div class="fsn-text fsn-58e55d781fe81">
<p>The MECTIZAN<sup>® </sup>(ivermectin) Donation Program is the longest-running disease-specific drug donation program and public-private partnership of its kind, and is widely regarded as one of the most successful public-private health collaborations in the world.</p>
</div></div></div><div class="col-sm-4"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d781fff4 light"><div class="fsn-button standard fsn-58e55d78201b5"><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/key-initiatives/patient-assistance-programs/" class="btn btn-info btn-block">Patient Assistance</a></div><div class="fsn-text fsn-58e55d78204cf">
<p>We believe that no one should go without the medicines or vaccines they need. More than 55 years ago, we created our first patient assistance program, to keep affordable medicine within patients’ reach.</p>
</div></div></div><div class="col-sm-4"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d782063b light"><div class="fsn-button standard fsn-58e55d7820807"><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/key-initiatives/msd-for-mothers/" class="btn btn-info btn-block">MSD for Mothers</a></div><div class="fsn-text fsn-58e55d7820b1e">
<p>Every 2 minutes a woman dies from complications related to pregnancy or childbirth. <em>MSD for Mothers</em> has committed $500,000,000 over 10 years to help create a world where no woman dies giving life.</p>
</div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="fsn-row full-width-row fsn-58e55d7820d29 light" style="background-repeat:repeat;background-position:left top;background-attachment:scroll;background-size:auto;"><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="col-sm-12"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d7820f15 light"><div class="fsn-text fsn-58e55d782108c">
<h5>FOR MORE INFORMATION ON ACCESS TO HEALTH</h5>
</div></div></div></div></div></div><div  class="fsn-row full-width-container fsn-58e55d7821220 light" style="background-repeat:repeat;background-position:left top;background-attachment:scroll;background-size:auto;"><div class="row"><div class="col-sm-4 col-sm-offset-4"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d78213f8 light"><div class="fsn-button standard fsn-58e55d78215a4"><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/our-approach-to-access/" class="btn btn-primary">Learn More</a></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div>
																										
					</article>
						
						
		
</div><div id="component-13" class="component clearfix"><div class="fsn-row full-width-row fsn-58e55d7834cd9 footer hidden-print light" style="background-repeat:repeat;background-position:left top;background-attachment:scroll;background-size:auto;"><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="col-sm-12"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55d7834fa9 light"><div class="fsn-menu inline fsn-58e55d78351fc"><ul class="list-inline"><li><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/our-approach/public-policy/">Public Policy</a></li><li><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/9-0-site-map/">Site Map</a></li><li><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/contact-us/">Contact Us</a></li><li><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/faq/">FAQ</a></li><li><a href="http://www.msd.com/privacy" target="_blank">Privacy</a></li><li><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/terms-of-use/">Terms of Use</a></li><li><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/ethics-transparency/transparency-disclosures/">Transparency Disclosures</a></li><li><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/forward-looking-statement/">Forward-Looking Statement</a></li></ul></div><div class="fsn-pdf-link fsn-58e55d78368f8 visible-xs-block"><a href="/wp-content/uploads/pdfs/access-to-health.pdf" target="_blank">Download This Page</a></div><div class="fsn-text fsn-58e55d7836a1a">

	<li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-441"><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/access-to-health/product-registration/">Product Registration</a></li>

			<div  class="fsn-row full-width-container fsn-58e55dd383be2 light" style="background-repeat:repeat;background-position:left top;background-attachment:scroll;background-size:auto;"><div url(http://s3.amazonaws.com/msd-assets/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/05105556/MRK_Banner_Empl_Giving_126_v1-1800x400.jpg);"><div class="bg hidden-xs hidden-print "  style="background-image: url(http://s3.amazonaws.com/msd-assets/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/05105556/MRK_Banner_Empl_Giving_126_v1-1800x400.jpg);"></div><div class="bg bg-overlay hidden-xs"></div><div class="fsn-header-content-container container"><div class="fsn-header-content"><div class="circles"><img src="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/wp-content/themes/msdresponsibility/images/header-icon-access-to-health.png" alt="Access to Health"><img src="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/wp-content/themes/msdresponsibility/images/header-icon-employees.png" alt="Employees"><img src="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/wp-content/themes/msdresponsibility/images/header-icon-ethics-transparency.png" alt="Ethics Transparency"></div><h3><a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/our-giving/">Our Giving</a></h3><div class="divider"></div><h2>Employee <br>Giving</h2></div></div></div><div class="fsn-header-print visible-print"><div class="fsn-header-print-img"><img src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/msd-assets/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/05105556/MRK_Banner_Empl_Giving_126_v1-680x280.jpg" class="fsn-header-print-image"></div><div class="fsn-header-print-overlay"></div><div class="fsn-header-print-h2">Employee <br>Giving</div><div class="fsn-header-print-h3">Our Giving</div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="fsn-row full-width-row fsn-58e55dd3850f5 light" style="background-repeat:repeat;background-position:left top;background-attachment:scroll;background-size:auto;"><div class="container"><div class="row"><div class="col-sm-8"><div class="fsn-column-inner fsn-58e55dd3857c9 light"><div class="fsn-tabs-container fsn-58e55dd385dc7 header_inset"><ul class="nav nav-tabs"><li class="active"><a href="#tab-559ede8afb18f" data-toggle="tab">Main</a></li><li><a href="#tab-559ede8afb190" data-toggle="tab">Volunteering</a></li><li><a href="#tab-559ee09b95720" data-toggle="tab">Partnership for Giving</a></li><li><a href="#performance" data-toggle="tab">Performance</a></li></ul><div class="tab-content"><div id="tab-559ede8afb18f" class="tab-pane active"><div class="fsn-tab-container"><div class="visible-print-block fsn-tab-label">Main</div><div class="fsn-text fsn-58e55dd386ea0">
<h3>Around the world, our employees take an active role in giving back to their communities through a variety of programs.</h3>
<p>We are proud of our employees’ dedication to serving others. Our Global Volunteerism Policy provides employees with the opportunity to take up to 40 hours of paid time off annually to engage in volunteer activities that support eligible nonprofit organizations. Additionally, we offer a dollar-for-dollar matching gift program for active and retired employees in the U.S. and Puerto Rico, and a “Dollars for Doers” volunteer rewards program, which provides contributions to eligible organizations, based on employee volunteer hours performed by active U.S. and Puerto Rico employees.</p>
</div></div></div><div id="tab-559ede8afb190" class="tab-pane"><div class="fsn-tab-container"><div class="visible-print-block fsn-tab-label">Volunteering</div><div class="fsn-text fsn-58e55dd3873e6">
<h3>Each year, thousands of our employees volunteer during work hours and on their personal time to give back to their communities.</h3>
<p>In celebration of our company&#8217;s 125th anniversary, employees have been challenged to reach a companywide goal of 125,000 recorded volunteer hours in 2016. Employees are being encouraged to seek volunteer opportunities with nonprofit organizations dedicated to the causes that mean the most to them.</p>
</div><div class="fsn-image fsn-58e55dd387da0 align-none"><img src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/msd-assets/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/05110133/PILL-125th-Identity-469x300-HEX-300x192.png" width="300" height="192" alt="" class="img-responsive img-thumbnail"></div><div class="fsn-text fsn-58e55dd387f0b">
<p>“MSD Gives Back” is our internal, global employee engagement website offering information and access about our giving and volunteering programs. The website serves as a central location where employees can record volunteer hours and share volunteer experiences through photos and stories. The site continues to draw new and returning visitors at a significant rate, with 60 percent of over 26,000 visits in 2015 attributed to first-time access.</p>
</div><div class="fsn-image fsn-58e55dd3887d5 align-none"><img src="http://s3.amazonaws.com/msd-assets/wp-content/uploads/2015/05/05110131/grow-a-row-volunteer-300x200.png" width="300" height="200" alt="" class="img-responsive img-default"></div><div class="fsn-text fsn-58e55dd38892c">
<h4>Skills-Based Volunteer Program</h4>
<p>In 2015 we launched an innovative skills-based volunteer program in the U.S. The program offers employees in the U.S. and Puerto Rico access to high-impact volunteer opportunities while providing nonprofit partners with much-needed skilled assistance to help build capacity for their organization. This skills-based volunteer program offers employees the opportunity to donate their professional skills through virtual, short-term projects that provide important, capacity-building support for nonprofit organizations. Whether volunteering for a one-hour phone consultation or a 30-hour project, employees are given the opportunity to provide meaningful volunteer support for nonprofits in need, while using their professional skills in different and challenging environments.</p>
<p>Our employees find these projects to be enjoyable and gratifying experiences that provide opportunities to enhance their individual skill sets. Since its launch in 2015, almost 600 employees have registered on the site and over 55 projects have been completed or are underway, representing over 1,500 volunteer hours donated. Positive feedback received through completed project testimonials reflects nonprofits’ satisfaction with program results and an appreciation for the support provided.</p>
<h4>MSD Fellowship for Global Health</h4>
<p>The <a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/our-giving/employee-giving/msd-fellowship-for-global-health/">MSD Fellowship for Global Health</a> is a three-month, field-based corporate pro bono program designed to leverage the skills and talents of our employees. It pairs employee skills with the needs of nonprofit partner organizations around the world to provide meaningful and systematic improvements in health service delivery for people in the greatest need. <a href="http://www.msdresponsibility.com/our-giving/employee-giving/msd-fellowship-for-global-health/">Learn more.</a></p>
<h4>Making Positive Choices</h4>
<p>Through the Making Positive Choices program, employees from New Jersey and Pennsylvania volunteer to have a positive influence on the lives of underserved and at-risk children and young adults through three programs offered and administered by Street Law, Inc. During 2015, more than 150 employees contributed 898 volunteer hours, reaching more than 500 students in school and community settings.</p>
<p>Volunteers were provided with training and support to enable their facilitation of three programs:</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>Community Works:</strong> helping teens to prepare youth for participation in their communities in a positive way</li>
<li><strong>Career Exploration:</strong> preparing high school students to achieve academic and career goals</li>
<li><strong>Youth in Transition:</strong> providing youth in the foster care system with instruction in basic life skills and guidance to navigate community resources to help them live independently</li>
</ul>
</div><div class="fsn-text fsn-58e55dd388a66">
<h4>Pro Bono Legal Program</h4>
<p>Our company’s Pro Bono Legal Program has been serving the poor and disadvantaged for over 21 years. Our legal professionals have been nationally recognized<sup>1</sup> for their commitment to providing pro bono assistance in areas such as guardianship, domestic violence, family law, child advocacy, Social Security disability benefits, veterans’ affairs, and bankruptcy, as well as legal support for nonprofit organizations.</p>
<p>During 2015, more than 140 attorneys, paralegals and administrative associates, representing over 50 percent of the company’s legal professionals, provided approximately 2,400 hours of pro bono legal services.</p>
<p>Our international attorneys, through a collaboration among external partners, attorneys from other multinational pro bono programs and local law firms, provided pro bono assistance in Bangladesh, Chile, India, Nigeria, Peru, Tanzania and Uganda, and Nepal. Our 2015 Pro Bono Legal Program included participation by 23 attorneys in 12 countries outside the U.S.</p>
<p>The Veterans Justice Initiative and the Landlord-Tenant Program of the <a href="https://www.lsnj.org/lsnwj/" target="_blank">Legal Services of Northwest Jersey, Inc.</a> (LSNWJ), provides legal assistance to low-income and vulnerable residents in meeting the basic needs essential to self-sufficiency. Our legal professionals, in collaboration with LSNWJ, outside counsel and other corporations, completed 271 cases, providing pro bono legal assistance to displaced or transitioning veterans and to low-income residents at risk of losing their housing.</p>
</div><div class="fsn-callout fsn-58e55dd388b93">
<p>More than 50 percent of our attorneys, paralegals and administrative associates have provided pro bono legal services.</p>
</div><div class="fsn-text fsn-58e55dd388c96">
<p>The <a href="https://www.probonopartner.org/">The Pro Bono Partnership</a>, a nationally-recognized organization, provides free business and transactional legal services to help nonprofits in New York, New Jersey, and Connecticut achieve their goals, avoid risk, and better serve their constituencies. In 2015, fifteen attorneys from our company’s Pro Bono Legal Program contributed to this organization’s ability to provide business legal services for 693 nonprofit organizations.</p>
<p><a href="http://www.vljnj.org">Volunteer Lawyers for Justice</a> (VLJ) relies on the talents and resources of volunteers to provide free legal services to low income individuals and families. Since 2009, our company has partnered with VLJ to provide pro bono legal services to low-income individuals and families seeking debt relief, and throughout 2015, our attorney’s and paralegals assisted VLJ in providing consumer-law counseling to 39 bankruptcy clients.</p>
</div><div class="fsn-table fsn-58e55dd388dde "><table class="table"><tr class="tfoot"><th colspan=""><sup>1</sup> In 2013, the company’s executive vice president &amp; general counsel and the Pro Bono volunteers received the Pro Bono Institute’s Laurie D. Zelon Award for their outstanding commitment to pro bono service.</th></tr>
</table></div></div></div><div id="tab-559ee09b95720" class="tab-pane"><div class="fsn-tab-container"><div class="visible-print-block fsn-tab-label">Partnership for Giving</div><div class="fsn-text fsn-58e55dd3897e8">
<h3>Partnership for Giving</h3>
<p>The Partnership for Giving (P4G) is our company’s year-round matching gift program. P4G supports active and retired employees in the U.S. and Puerto Rico who donate to causes that are important to them. Contributions to eligible organizations are matched dollar-for-dollar by our company’s Foundation in support of nonprofits that help to promote a healthier society, advance education, foster the arts, address the welfare of animals and preserve the environment.</p>
<p>As volunteers for nonprofit organizations, active employees in the U.S. and Puerto Rico can have their volunteer hours matched by a cash contribution. Through the Dollars for Doers program, funded by our company’s Foundation, employees investing 40 hours or more of service with an eligible organization can apply for a $500 contribution for that nonprofit, with an annual limit of two donations per eligible employee or volunteer team.</p>
<h3></h3>
<h3>Touched by an Agency</h3>
<p>Throughout 2015, employees shared their personal stories in recognition of and gratitude for nonprofit organizations that have made a difference in their lives or the lives of a family member. Through the Touched by an Agency program, employees were invited to nominate nonprofit agencies to receive a $1,000 donation as a “thank you” for their valued service. The 2015 Touched by an Agency program provided donations totaling $17,000.</p>

   <script type="text/javascript">
        function hrefChange(current) {
                  var siteUrl = _spPageContextInfo.siteServerRelativeUrl;   
            var url = window.location.href.toLowerCase();
            if (siteUrl.length == 1) {
                siteUrl = window.location.protocol + "//" + window.location.host;
            }
            else {
                siteUrl = window.location.protocol + "//" + window.location.host + _spPageContextInfo.siteServerRelativeUrl;
            }
            
                    var localPagesStr = window.location.href.toLowerCase().split('/')[window.location.href.toLowerCase().split('/').length-2];
                    var targetUrl = $(current).attr("href").replace("pages", localPagesStr);               
            $(current).attr("href", siteUrl + targetUrl);
            return true;
        }

    </script>

    })();

$(document).ready(function() { 
   
    if(countrySiteUrl.length > 1)
     {
       $("link[class='cssfile']").each(function(index){     
          var hrefValue = $(this).attr("href"); 
          $(this).attr("href",countrySiteUrl + hrefValue);    
       });     
     }        
    });

    <script type="text/javascript">
    $(function() {
    var addBgtable = $("table[class='']:first", $("div[.sideNav]>table"));
    if (addBgtable.size() > 0) {
        var tr = addBgtable.parent().parent().prev();
        
        if (tr.size() > 0) {
            var removeBgTable = $("table", tr);
            if (removeBgTable.size() > 0) {            
                removeBgTable.css({'background':'none'});
            }
        }
        addBgtable.addClass("leftNav_ChangeBgStyle");
    }
}); 
    </script>

<script type ="text/javascript">
// <![CDATA[
function OnSelectionChange(value)
{
	var today = new Date();
	var oneYear = new Date(today.getTime() + 365 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);
	var url = window.location.href;
	document.cookie = "lcid=" + value + ";path=/;expires=" + oneYear.toGMTString();
	window.location.href = url;
}
// ]]>
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
    
    var _ribbon = new Object();
    _ribbon.initialTabId = 'Ribbon.Read';
    _ribbon.buildMinimized = true;
    _ribbon.initStarted = false;
    _ribbon.initialTabSelectedByUser = false;
    _ribbon.launchedByKeyboard = false;

    function _ribbonInitFunc1()
    {
        try
        {
            var temp = new CUI.RibbonBuildOptions();
        }
        catch(e)
        {
            return;
        }

        var options = new CUI.RibbonBuildOptions();
        options.lazyTabInit = true;
        options.shallowTabs = true;
        options.lazyMenuInit = true;
        options.attachToDOM = false;
        options.initialScalingIndex = 0;
        options.validateServerRendering = false;
        options.showQATId = '';
        options.showJewelId = '';
        options.minimized = _ribbon.buildMinimized;
        options.shownTabs = {'Ribbon.EditingTools.CPInsert':true,'Ribbon.EditingTools.CPEditTab':true,'Ribbon.Link.Link':true,'Ribbon.Table.Layout':true,'Ribbon.Read':true,'Ribbon.WebPartPage':true,'Ribbon.Table.Design':true,'Ribbon.Image.Image':true};;
        options.shownContextualGroups = null;
        options.initiallyVisibleContextualGroups = null;
        options.normalizedContextualGroups = null;
        options.trimmedIds = {'Ribbon.WebPartInsert.InsertRelatedDataToListForm':true,'Ribbon.EditingTools.CPEditTab.Layout':true,'Ribbon.EditingTools.CPEditTab.EditAndCheckout':true};;
        options.enabledVisibilityContexts = {'WSSRTE':true};;
        options.fixedPositioningEnabled = false;
        options.clientID = 'RibbonContainer';
        options.trimEmptyGroups = true;
        options.dataExtensions = null;
        options.scalingHint = '-1982055594';
        options.initialTabSelectedByUser = _ribbon.initialTabSelectedByUser;
        options.launchedByKeyboard = _ribbon.launchedByKeyboard;

        try
        {
            var temp = SP.Ribbon.PageManager.get_instance();
        }
        catch(e)
        {
            return;
        }

        g_builder = new CUI.RibbonBuilder(options, document.getElementById('RibbonContainer'), SP.Ribbon.PageManager.get_instance());
        var dataSource = new CUI.DataSource('\u002f_layouts\u002fcommandui.ashx', '-846416839', '1033');
        g_builder.set_dataSource(dataSource);

        g_builder.buildRibbonAndInitialTab(_ribbon.initialTabId);
    }

    function _ribbonStartInit(initialTabId, buildMinimized, e)
    {
        if (true && typeof(_ribbonReadyForInit) == 'function' && !_ribbonReadyForInit())
            return;

        if (e)
        {
            _ribbon.initialTabSelectedByUser = true;
        }

        var firstTabId = null;
        var evt = e || window.event;
        if (evt)
        {
            if (!evt.preventDefault)
                evt.returnValue = false;
            else
                evt.preventDefault();
        }

        if (_ribbon.initStarted)
            return;
        _ribbon.initStarted = true;
        if(typeof(CUI) != 'undefined' && typeof(CUI.PMetrics) != 'undefined')
            CUI.PMetrics.perfMark(CUI.PMarker.perfCUIRibbonInitStart);
        if (initialTabId)
        {
            firstTabId = _ribbon.initialTabId;
            _ribbon.initialTabId = initialTabId;
        }
        if (typeof(buildMinimized) != 'undefined')
            _ribbon.buildMinimized = buildMinimized;

        if(initialTabId && initialTabId != "undefined" && _ribbonOnStartInit)
        {
            _ribbonOnStartInit(_ribbon);
            
            var oldTab = document.getElementById(firstTabId + "-title");
            if (oldTab)
                oldTab.className = "ms-cui-tt";

            var newTab = document.getElementById(initialTabId + "-title");
            if (newTab)
                newTab.className = "ms-cui-tt ms-cui-tt-s";
        }
        

        var _spRibbonInstantiateByRibbonControl = true;

        function _registerCommonComponents()
        {  
            SP.Ribbon.HelpPageComponent.registerWithPageManager();
            SP.Ribbon.UserInterfacePageComponent.registerWithPageManager();
        }
        ExecuteOrDelayUntilScriptLoaded(_registerCommonComponents, "sp.ribbon.js");

        
        function _registerCUIEComponent()
        {  
            var instance = SP.Ribbon.CommandUIExtensionPageComponent.get_instance();
            instance.set_dataUrl('\u002f_layouts\u002fcommandui.ashx');
            instance.set_dataLCID('1033');
            instance.set_dataVersion('-846416839');
            SP.Ribbon.CommandUIExtensionPageComponent.registerWithPageManager();
        }
        ExecuteOrDelayUntilScriptLoaded(_registerCUIEComponent, "sp.ribbon.js");

        var defd;
        try
        {
            defd = typeof(SP.Ribbon.PageManager);
        }
        catch (e)
        {
            defd = "undefined";
        }
        EnsureScript("ribbon", defd, _ribbonInitFunc1);


    }

    function _ribbonKeyboardTitleShortcut(e)
    {
        var evt = e || window.event;
        if (evt)
        {
            var key = (evt.ctrlKey) ? 't' : 'f';
            key += (evt.altKey) ? 't' : 'f';
            key += (evt.shiftKey) ? 't' : 'f';
            try
            {
                key += String.fromCharCode(_processKeyCodes(evt.keyCode));
            }
            catch (error)
            {
                return;
            }

            if(key == 'tff[' || (evt.ctrlKey && evt.keyCode == 117)) // Use Ctrl+F6 as well
            {
                if(document.selection && document.selection.type == 'Control')
                {
                    var r = document.selection.createRange();
                    var len = r.length;
                    for (; len > 0; len--)
                    {
                        r.remove(len - 1);
                    }
                    r.select();
                }

                var tabHead = document.getElementById('Ribbon.Read-title');
                if(tabHead)
                {
                    tabHead = tabHead.firstChild.focus();
                    if(evt.preventDefault)
                        evt.preventDefault();
                    else
                        evt.returnValue = false;

                    if(evt.stopPropagation)
                        evt.stopPropagation();
                    else
                        evt.cancelBubble = true;
                }
            }
        }
    }

    if (false)
        _spBodyOnLoadFunctionNames.push("_ribbonStartInit");


    function _ribbonOnWindowResizeForHeaderScaling(evt)
    {
        if (_ribbon.initStarted)
            return;
        _ribbonScaleHeader(document.getElementById('RibbonContainer').firstChild.childNodes[1], false);
    }
    if (typeof(_ribbonScaleHeader) == 'function' && true)
    {        
        _ribbonScaleHeader(document.getElementById('RibbonContainer').firstChild.childNodes[1], false);
        if (window.addEventListener)
            window.addEventListener('resize', _ribbonOnWindowResizeForHeaderScaling, false);
        else if(window.attachEvent)
            window.attachEvent('onresize', _ribbonOnWindowResizeForHeaderScaling);            
    }
    

    if(document.addEventListener)
        document.addEventListener('keydown', _ribbonKeyboardTitleShortcut, false);
    else
        document.attachEvent('onkeydown', _ribbonKeyboardTitleShortcut);
//]]>
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
//<![CDATA[
var g_commandUIHandlers = {"name":"CommandHandlers","attrs":{},"children":[]};
//]]>
</script>
	  
	  <!-- end main ribbon control -->
	</div>

                {

{
if (scriptInfoList.length == 0)
{
finalFunction();
}
else
{
var scriptInfo = scriptInfoList.shift();

function _RegisterWebPartPageCUI()
{
    var initInfo = {editable: false,isEditMode: false,allowWebPartAdder: false,listId: "{fc166dbf-ebf8-4726-a9fb-633cb366a7a5}",itemId: 4,recycleBinEnabled: true,enableMinorVersioning: true,enableModeration: true,forceCheckout: true,rootFolderUrl: "\u002fPages",itemPermissions:{High:16,Low:200769}};

    var wpcomp = SP.Ribbon.WebPartComponent.get_instance();
    var hid;
    hid = document.getElementById("_wpSelected");
    if (hid != null)
    {
        var wpid = hid.value;
        if (wpid.length > 0)
        {
            var zc = document.getElementById(wpid);
            if (zc != null)
                wpcomp.selectWebPart(zc, false);
        }
    }
    hid = document.getElementById("_wzSelected");
    if (hid != null)
    {
        var wzid = hid.value;
        if (wzid.length > 0)
        {
            wpcomp.selectWebPartZone(null, wzid);
        }
    }
}

  <article class="node-9063 node node-story view-mode-full clearfix" about="/content/bahija-morocco" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document">

      <header>

<p>What a beautiful feeling of expecting a baby, feeling of a human being, a life is taking shape within oneself. It is so beautiful, magical and this is one of the divine virtues of women. But good things never come alone as they say. When I expected to accomplish the miracle, leukemia came and coexisted under the same roof and deprived me from enjoying a full and perfect happiness in my family.</p>
<p>Diagnosed near the end of my pregnancy, I was afraid of losing my baby, my life, my family, I was afraid of losing everything, miss everything. I reproached, I feel guilty, I hesitated repeatedly, I would give up and stop hoping. I could never overcome leukemia, I could never beat cancer.. I thought that the fight is futile; useless
